42008039	" Return to your home , and tell them all that God has done for you . " So he went away and throughout the whole city he published how much Jesus had done for him .
42008040	And as Jesus returned the crowd welcomed him ;
42008041	for they were all waiting for him . Just then there came a man named Jarius , and he was ruler in the synagogue . He fell down at Jesus feet and begged him to come into his house ;
42008042	for he had only one daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay dying . But as he went the crowds continued to press in on him .
42008043	And a woman who for twelve years had had a hemorrhage , and had spent on doctors all that she had , but none had cured her ,
42008044	came close behind him , and touched the hem of his garment ; and instantly the hemorrhage ceased .
42008045	" Who is that touched me ? " said Jesus and when everybody denied it , Peter said , " Master , the crowds are hemming you in and pressing upon you . "
42008046	But Jesus said . " Some one did touch me ; for I perceived that the power was proceeding out of me . "
42008047	Then the woman , who saw that she had not escaped notice , came trembling , and falling down before him , stated before the people for what reason she had touched him , and how she had been instantly healed .
42008048	" Daughter , " he said " your faith has made you well , go on into peace . "
42008049	As he was speaking some one came from the house of the synagogue , saying . " Your daughter is dead ! Do not trouble the Master . "
42008050	But Jesus heard and answered . " Have no fear . Only believe , and she shall be restored . "
42008051	So he came to the house , and would not permit anyone to go in with him except Peter and Johnand James , and the father and Mother of the little girl .
42008052	The people were weeping and bewailing her , but he said . " Stop your wailing ; for she is not dead , but asleep . "
42008053	They began to laugh him to scorn , because they knew well that she was dead .
42008054	But he took her by the hand and called to her , " Little daughter , rise ! "
42008055	And her spirit returned and instantly she stood up .
42008056	He bade them to get her some food . Her parents were amazed ; but he forbade them to tell any one what had been done .
42009001	Then he called the Twelve together , and gave them power and authority over all demons , and to heal ;
42009002	and sent them out to preach the kingdom of God , and heal the sick .
42009003	And he said to them . " Take nothing for your journey , neither staff , nor bag , nor bread , nor money , and do not have two tunics .
42009004	" Into whatever house you enter , there stay , and thence depart .
42009005	" If any one will not receive you , shake off the dust from your feet as you leave this town , as a testimony against them . "
42009006	So they went forth , and walked from village to village , preaching the gospel and healing everywhere .
42009007	Now Herod , the Tetrarch , heard of all that was happening ; and he was perplexed because of its being said by someone that Johnwas risen from the dead ;
42009008	and by some that Elijah had appeared ; and by others that one of the ancient prophets was risen again .
42009009	So Herod said , " I beheaded John , but who is this of whom I am hearing such reports , " And he kept seeking to see him .
42009010	On their return the apostles told him what they had done . and he took them and withdrew in private to a town called Bethsaida .
42009011	But when the crowd learned this they followed him . He received them kindly and spoke to them concerning the kingdom of God , and healed those who needed restored to good health .
42009012	But now the day began to decline , and the twelve came to him and said . " Send away the crowd so that they may go into the villages and surrounding the country to lodge and buy provisions ; for here we are on a solitary place . "
42009013	" Do you yourselves give them food , " he answered . " We have nothing , " they replied " Except five loaves , and a couple fish , unless you mean for us to go and buy provisions for all the crowd . "
42009014	( For there were about five thousand men . ) " Make them sit down in table-companies , of about fifty each , " he said to his disciples .
42009015	This they did , and made them all sit down .
42009016	Then he took the five loaves and the two fish , and looking up in heaven , he blessed them , broke them in pieces , and began to giving to his disciples to apportion among the crowd .
42009017	So they ate and were filled , all of them . And there was picked up that which remained over to them , of broken pieces , twelve basketfuls .
42009018	Now it happened that while he was praying by himself , the disciples were with him , and he asked them a question . " Who do the crowd think I am ? "
42009019	" Johnthe Baptist , " they answered , " But others say Elijah , and others that one of the ancient prophets is risen again . "
42009020	Then he said to them , " But who do you say I am ? Then Peter answered saying , " The Christ of God .
42009021	Then he strictly forbade them to tell this to any one ;
42009022	and he said , " The Son of man must suffer much , and be restricted by the elders and high priests and scribes and be put to death , and on the third day be raised again . "
42009023	And he said to all . " If any man wills to follow me , Let him renounce self and take up his cross daily and follow me .
42009024	" For whoever wills to save his life shall lose it ; and whoever loses his life for my sake shall save it .
42009025	" For what shall it profit a man if he shall gain the whole world and lose or forfeit himself ?
42009026	" For whoever is ashamed of me and of my teachings , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed when he comes in his own and in his Fathers glory , and in that of the holy angels .
42009027	" But I tell you truly there are some of those standing here who will not taste death till they see the kingdom of God . "
42009028	About eight days after this it happened that Jesus took Peter , James , and John , and went up on the mountain to pray .
42009029	And as he was praying the appearances of his countenance became different , and his clothing became white and dazzling .
42009030	And suddenly there were two men talking with him , who were Moses and Elijah .
42009031	These appeared in glory and talked about his departure which he was about to accomplish at Jerusalem .
42009032	Now Peter and those who were with him were heavy with sleep ; but when they were fully awake they saw his glory , and the two men were standing beside him .
42009033	And when they were preparing to depart from him Peter said to Jesus . " Master , it is good for us to be here ; and let us make three tents , one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah " - not knowing what he was saying .
42009034	And while he was saying this , there came a cloud and began to overshadow them ; and they were awestruck as they entered into the cloud .
42009035	And a voice came out of the cloud , saying . " This is my Son , my chosen one ; listen to him . "
42009036	When the voice ceased Jesus was found alone . And they held their peace , and told no one at that time about what they had seen .
42009037	It happened the next day , when they were come down from the mountain , that a large crowd came to meet him ;
42009038	and a man called out of the crowd saying . " Teacher , I beg you to look upon my son ; for he is my only boy ,
42009039	" and behold a spirit seizes hold of him , and rudely he shouts out , It convulses him till he foams ; indeed it will hardly leave off bruising him sorely .
42009040	" I begged your disciples to cast it out , but they could not . "
42009041	" O faithless and perverse generation , " said Jesus , " how long shall I be with you and bear with you ? Bring your son to me . "
42009042	But while he was yet coming the demon dashed him down , and cruelly convulsed him . Then Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and cured the boy , and gave him back to his father .
42009043	And they were all awestruck at the mighty power of God . But while everyone was marveling at what he was doing , he said to his disciples .
42009044	" Let these words sink into your ears ; for the son of man is about to be betrayed into the hands of men . "
42009045	But they did not understand this saying ; it was hidden from them so that they perceived it not , and they were sore afraid to ask him about his saying .
42009046	Now there arose a dispute among them as to which one of them was the greatest .
42009047	And Jesus who knew the dispute that was in their hearts , took a young child , and placed him by his side ;
42009048	then he said to them . " Whoever shall receive this little child in my name receives me ; and whoever shall receive me receives him that sent me . For it is the lowliest among you all who is great . "
42009049	" Master , " said John , " we saw a man who was casting out demons in your name , and we forbade him , because he was not following us . "
42009050	But Jesus said , " Forbid him not , for he who is not against you is for you . "
42009051	When now when the time drew near for him to be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
42009052	and sent messengers before him . These went and entered into a Samaritan village to make ready for him .
42009053	But they did not receive him because his face was set to go to Jerusalem .
42009054	And when his disciples , Jamesand John , saw this they said , " Lord , are you willing for us to bid fire come down from heaven and destroy them ? " As Elijah did .
42009055	But he turned and rebuked them and said ,
42009056	" You know not what kind of spirit you share , for the Son of man came not to destroy mens lives , but to save them . " And they went to another village .
42009057	As they were going on their way , a man came to him and said , " I will follow wherever you go . "
42009058	" The foxes have their holes , " Jesus answered , " and the wild birds have their nest , but the Son of man has not where to lay his head . "
42009059	To another he said , " Follow me ! " But he replied , " Permit me first to go and bury my father . "
42009060	" Leave the dead to bury their own dead , " said Jesus to him , " go you and announce , far and wide the kingdom of God . "
42009061	And another man also said to him . " I will follow you , Lord ; but first permit me to bid farewell to those who are in my house . "
42009062	But Jesus answered him , " No man who puts his hand to the plow and then looks back , is fit for the kingdom of God . "
42010001	After this the appointed seventy others , and sent them two by two before his face , into every city and place into which he himself intended to go .
42010002	And he thus addressed them . " The harvest is abundant , but the harvesters are few . do you therefore pray the lord of the harvest to send forth harvesters into his harvest .
42010003	" Go your way ; behold , I am sending you forth like lambs among wolves .
42010004	" Carry no purse , no bag , no shoes ; and do not salute any one on your journey .
42010005	" Into whatever you first enter , say , Peace be to this house !
42010006	" And if there be any son of peace there , your peace shall rest upon him ; but if not it shall return to you .
42010007	" Stay in that same house , eating and drinking what they give . for the laborer is worthy of his hire . Do not go from house to house .
42010008	" And whatever town you come to , and they receive you , eat whatever they put before you .
42010009	" Heal the sick in that town and tell them , The kingdom of God draws near to you .
42010010	" But whatever town you enter , and they do not receive you , Go out into the streets and cry ,

42010014	" However , it will be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon in the judgment than for you .
42010015	" And you Capernaum , shall you be exalted to heaven ? No ! you shall be brought down to Hades !

42010017	Then the Seventy returned with joy , saying , " Lord even the demons are subject to us in your name . "
42010018	And he said to them . " I watched Satan fall from heaven like a lightning flash .

42010020	" Nevertheless , do not rejoice at this , that the spirits are subject to you ; but rejoice that your names are written in Heaven . "
42010021	In the same hour he thrilled with joy in the Holy Ghost . " I praise thee , Father , Lord of Heaven and Earth , " he said " for hiding these things from the wise and prudent , and for revealing them to babes . Yea , Father , for so it was well pleasing in thy sight !
42010022	" All things have been delivered to me by my Father , and no one knows who the Son is except the Father ; and who the Father is except the Son , and he the Son wishes to reveal him . "
42010023	And turning to his disciples he said privately . " Blessed are the eyes that see what you see !
42010024	" For I tell you that many prophets and kings have longed to see what you see , and have seen it ; and to hear what you hear , and have heard it not .
42010025	Then a certain lawyer stood up and tempted him . " Master , " he said " what shall I do to inherit eternal life ? "
42010026	And he said to him . " What is written in the Law ? What do you read there ? "
42010027	" You must love the Lord your God , " he answered , with all your heart , and with all your soul , and with all your strength , and with all your with all your mind ; and your neighbor as yourself . "
42010028	" You have answered right , " said Jesus " do that and you shall live . "
42010029	But he , determined to justify himself , said to Jesus , " But who is my neighbor ? " Jesus answered .
42010030	" A certain man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho , when he fell among bandits who both stripped him and beat him , and went off leaving him half dead .
42010031	" Now a certain priest chanced to be going down that way , but on seeing him he passed on the other side .
42010032	" In like manner also a Levite who came to the spot , came and looked at him , and passed on the other side .
42010033	" But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was , and when he saw him was moved with compassion .
42010034	" He went to him bound up his wounds , pouring on them oil and wine . He set him on his own beast , and took him to an inn , and took care of him .
42010035	" The next day he took two silver pieces and gave them to the landlord and said , " Take care of him , and whatever more you spend I will repay it to you on my way back .
42010036	" Which then of these three seems to you to have behaved like a neighbor to the man who fell among bandits ? "
42010037	He replied , " The one who showed mercy on him . " " Go , then , " said Jesus , " and do likewise . "
42010038	It happened as they went on their way that he entered into a certain village were a woman named Martha received him into her house .
42010039	She had a sister named Mary , who after seating herself at the Lords feet was listening to his teaching .
42010040	But Martha meanwhile was growing distracted about much serving . She came up to him and said . " Lord do you not care that my sister has left me alone to do the serving ? Come tell her to take hold of her end of the work along with me . "
42010041	" Martha , Martha , " said Jesus , " you are anxious and worried about many things ,
42010042	" only one thing is really necessary . Mary , moreover , has chosen that good part which shall not be taken away from her . "
42011001	It happened he was praying in a certain place , and when he stopped , one of his disciples said to him , " Master , teach us how to pray , just as Johntaught his disciples . "
42011002	So he said to them . " When you pray , say , " Father , hallowed be thy name ; May thy kingdom come ,
42011003	" Give us day by day our bread for the coming day ;
42011004	" Forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive everyone who has offended us ; " And bring us not into temptation . "
42011005	He also said to them . " Suppose you have a friend and you go to him , My friend , lend me three loaves of bread ,
42011006	" for a friend of mine is come to me from a journey , and I have nothing to set before him .
42011007	" and he from indoors shall answer . Do not pester me . The door is now closed , and my children are with me in bed . I cannot rise and give to you .
42011008	" I tell you that , though he will not rise and give to him because he is his friend , yet because of his importunate persistence he will rise and give him whatever he needs .
42011009	" So I say to you . " Ask , and it shall be given to you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock and it shall be opened to you .
42011010	" For he that asks receives , and he who seeks finds , and to him who knocks the door shall be opened .
42011011	" What father is there among you who , if his son asks for a loaf , will give him a stone ? Or if he asks for a fish will give him instead a serpent ?
42011012	" Or if he asks for an egg , will offer him a scorpion ?
42011013	" If you give good gifts to your children , how much more shall the Father who is in heaven give the Holy spirit to those that ask him ! "
42011014	Once he was casting out a dumb demon , and when the demon was gone out , the dumb man spoke , and the people wondered .
42011015	But some of them said , " It is by Beelzebub , the prince of demons , that he cast out demons . "
42011016	Others , tempting him , kept seeking from him a sign from heaven .
42011017	He knew their intentions and said to them . " Every kingdom divided against itself is laid waste and house falls upon house .
42011018	" And if Satan also is divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ?
42011019	" Do you say that I am casting out demons by the power of Beelzebub ? If I then am casting out demons by Beelzebub , by whom are your sons casting them out ? They therefore shall be your judges .
42011020	" But if it is by the finger of God that I am casting out demons , then the kingdom of God is come upon you .
42011021	" When the strong man fully aroused keeps guard over his homestead , his property is undisturbed ;
42011022	" but when the stronger man attacks him , he takes away from the strong armor in which he was trusting and divides up the spoil .
42011023	" He who is not for me is against me , and he who is not gathering with me is scattering .
42011024	" Whenever a foul spirit is gone out of a man , it roams through waterless places , in search of rest ; but when it can find none , it says , I will go back to the house which I have left .
42011025	When it comes and finds the house completely swept and garnished .
42011026	" Then it goes off and fetches seven other spirits more wicked than itself , and they go in and live there . And the last state of that man is worse than the first . "
42011027	It happened while he was saying this , that a certain woman out of the crowd shouted to him , saying , " Blessed is the womb that bore you , and the breast that you have sucked . "
42011028	" No , rather , " he answered , " blessed are those who listen to the word of God , and keep it . "
42011029	When the crowd were beginning to throng about him he proceeded to say . " This is an evil generation ! It seeks a sign , and there shall be no sign be given to it except the sign of Jonah ;
42011030	" for as Jonah became a sign to the Ninevites , so shall the Son of man be to this generation .
42011031	" The queen of the South shall rise up in Judgement with the men of this generation , and shall condemn them ; because she came from the ends of the earth to listen to the wisdom of Solomon , and lo , one greater than Solomon is here !
42011032	" The men of the Nineveh shall stand up in the judgment with his generation and shall condemn it , for they repented at the preaching of Jonah , and lo ! one greater than Jonah is here !
42011033	" When one lights a lamp he does not put it in a cellar nor under the bushel , but on a lamp-stand that those who enter may see the light .
42011034	" The lamp of the body is your eye ; when your eye is single then your whole body is full of light ; but when it is evil your whole body is full of darkness .
42011035	" Look carefully ! Perhaps that very light of yours is darkness .
42011036	" If , however , your whole body is full of light , without having any part dark , it will be wholly radiant with light , as when the lamp illumines you with its bright rays . "
42011037	When he had finished speaking a Pharisee asked him to dine with him ; so he went in with him and reclined .
42011038	And the Pharisee noticed , to his amazement , that he did not wash his hands before eating ,
42011039	but the Lord said to him . " You Pharisee do cleanse the outside of your cup or plate , but your secret heart is full of extortion and wickedness .
42011040	" Foolish men ! Did not He who made the outside make the inside also ?
42011041	" Better cleanse what is within , and nothing will be unclean for you .
42011042	" But woe unto you Pharisee ! for you tithe mint and rue and every herb , and disregard justice and the love of God ; but these you ought to have done , and not leave the other undone .
42011043	" Woe unto you Pharisee ! for you delight in the best seats in the synagogue , and in the salutation in the market-places .
42011044	" Woe unto you ! for you are like the tombs which are hidden , and men walk over them unsuspecting . "
42011045	Hereupon one of the lawyers exclaimed , " But teacher , in saying such things you are also reproaching us also . "
42011046	" Woe unto you lawyers also ! " said Jesus , " for you load men with irksome burdens , and you yourselves will not touch the burdens with one of your fingers .
42011047	" Woe to you ! for you are building the tombs of the prophets whom you ancestors killed .
42011048	" So you are witnesses , and you consent to the actions of your ancestors . for they killed them , and you build their tombs .
42011049	" For this reason also said the Wisdom of God . I will send them prophets and apostles ; some of them they will kill and some they will persecute ;
42011050	" so that the blood of all the prophets which was shed from the foundation of the world may be required from this generation ,
42011051	" from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zachariah , who perished between the alter and the sanctuary ; yes ; I tell you , it shall be required of this generation !
42011052	" Woe to you lawyers , for you have taken away the key of knowledge ! You yourselves have not entered , and you have hindered those who are trying to enter . "
42011053	After he had gone away , the Scribes and the Pharisee began to set themselves vehemently against him , and to cross-question him upon many points ,
42011054	laying in wait for him , in order to catch a word from his lips .
42012001	Meanwhile when myriads of the multitudes were thronging around him so that they trod one upon another , he began to say to his disciples , first of all . " Beware of the leaven of the Pharisee , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	" There is nothing hidden which shall not be revealed ; nothing concealed that shall not be known .
42012003	" So that what you have said in the dark shall be heard in the light ; and what you have whispered in the inner chambers shall be proclaimed from the housetops .
42012004	" But I say to you who are my friends , do not be afraid of those who kill the body and after that have no more that they can do .
42012005	" I will warn you whom you ought to fear . Fear him who , after he was after he has killed , has power to throw you into Gehenna . Yes , I tell you , fear him .
42012006	" Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings ? Yet not one of them is forgotten in the sight of God !
42012007	" But the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not ! You are of more value than many sparrow !
42012008	" And I tell you that whoever confesses me before men , the Son of man will confess him before the angels of God ;
42012009	" and whoever disowns me before men , shall be disowned before the angels of God .
42012010	" If any one shall speak a word against the Son of man it shall be forgiven him ; but he who is blasphemes against the Holy Spirit shall not be forgiven .
42012011	" And when they are bringing you before the synagogues and the rulers and authorities , do not worry about how or what you shall answer ; or what you shall say ;
42012012	" for the Holy Spirit will teach you in that hour what you ought to say . "
42012013	Then one of the crowd said to him , " Master , tell my brother to give me my share of our inheritance . "
42012014	" Man , " said he , " who made me a judge or arbitrator over you ? "
42012015	And to the people he said , " Take heed and guard yourselves from all covetousness , for a mans life does not consist in the abundance of the things which he possesses . "
42012016	Then he spoke to them in a parable . " The ground of a certain rich man bore heavy crops .
42012017	" So he debated with himself saying , What shall I do ? for I have no place in which to store my crops .
42012018	" And he said to himself . This is what I will do . I will pull down my barns and build larger ones in which I will store all my wheat and my goods .
42012019	" And I will say to my soul , " Soul , you have many goods laid up for many years ! Take your ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
42012020	" But God said to him . Foolish man ! This very night your soul is wanted ! And these things you have prepared , whose shall they be ?
42012021	" So is he that lays up treasures for himself and is not rich toward God . "
42012022	Then he said to his disciples . " For this is the reason I say to you . Be not anxious for your life , what you shall eat ; nor yet your body what shall you wear .
42012023	" For the life is more than food , and the body is more than clothes .
42012024	" Consider the ravens ; they neither sow nor reap ; they have no storehouse nor barn . And yet God feeds them . How much more are you worth than the birds ?
42012025	" And which of you by taking anxious thought can add a cubit to his height ?
42012026	" If then you cannot do even that which is least , why are you anxious concerning the rest ?
42012027	" Consider the lilies how they grow ! They toil not , neither do they spin , yet I say to you that even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
42012028	" Now if God so clothe the grass in the field , which today is , and tomorrow is cast into the oven , will he not much more clothe you , O you of little faith ?
42012029	" So do not be asking what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , and be not of doubtful mind .
42012030	" For all these things the nations of the world are seeking ; but your Father knows that you have need of these things .
42012031	" But seek his kingdom , and these things shall be added to you .
42012032	" Fear not , little flock , for it is your Fathers good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
42012033	" Sell what you have and give alms . Provide yourselves with purses which do not grow old , a treasure inexhaustible in the heavens , where no thief draws near , nor does moth destroy .
42012034	" For where your treasure is there will your heart be also .
42012035	" Let your loins be girded about and your lamps burning ;
42012036	" and be yourselves like men who are looking for the Lord , on his return from a wedding banquet , so that when he comes and knocks they may at once open the door for him .
42012037	" Happy are those slaves whom their master shall find watching when he comes . I tell you truly that will gird himself , and make them sit down to meat , and come and serve them .
42012038	" And whether it be in the second watch , or in the third , that he comes , and so finds them , happy are those slaves .
42012039	" However , you know this , that if the master of the house had known in what hour the thief would come , he would have watched and not have allowed his house to be broken into .
42012040	" Do you also be ready , for in an hour that you think not the Son of man is coming . "
42012041	" Master , " said Peter , " are you speaking this parable to us or to all alike ? "
42012042	The Lord answered . " Who then is that faithful steward , the wise man whom his Lord will put in charge of the rations in due time ?
42012043	" Blessed is that slave whom his master on his coming shall find so doing .
42012044	" Of a truth I tell you that he will put him in charge of his possessions .
42012045	" But if that slave should say to himself , My master delays his coming , and should begin to beat the men and the maids , and to eat and drink and to get drunk ,
42012046	" that slaves master will arrive on a day when he is not expecting him , and at an hour when he knows not , and will surely scourge him , and appoint him his portion with the unfaithful .
42012047	" The slave who knew his Lords will , and made not ready , nor did according to his will , will be beaten with many lashes ,
42012048	" but he who did not know , but did things worthy of a beating , will receive few lashes . To whom much has been given , from him much will be required , and to whom much is entrusted , of him they will ask the more .
42012049	" I came to build a fire upon the earth ; what is my desire ?
42012050	" Would it were already kindled ! But I have a baptism to be baptized with , and how am I straitened till it is accomplished !
42012051	" Do you think that I am come to make peace on the earth ? No , I tell you , but rather dissension .
42012052	" From this time there will be five in one house divided , three against two and two against three ;
42012053	" father against son and son against father ; mother against daughter and daughter against her mother ; mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law and daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law . "
42012054	Then he said to the crowd also . " When you see a cloud rising in the west you at once say , There is going to be a shower , and it comes to pass .
42012055	" And when you feel the south winds blowing you say , There will be a hot wind , and it comes to pass .
42012056	" Hypocrites ! you know how to read the face of the earth and of the sky ; but how is it that you do not know how to read the signs of the present time ?
42012057	" And why do you not , even yourselves , judge what is right ?
42012058	" For as you go before the magistrate with your opponent do your utmost to get quit of him , lest he drag you before the judge , and the judge delivers you over to the officer , and the officer cast you into prison .
42012059	" You shall by no means come out of there until you have paid the very last farthing . "
42013001	Now there were some present at that very season who told him about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifies .
42013002	" Do you suppose , " he answered them , " that those Galileans were worse sinners than the rest of the Galileans because they have suffered thus ?
42013003	" I tell you no ; but unless you repent , you will all likewise perish .
42013004	" Or those eighteen on whom the tower in Siloam fell and killed them , do you suppose that they were worse offenders than the rest of those who lived in Jerusalem ?
42013005	" I tell you no ; but unless you repent , you will all perish as they did . "
42013006	Then he gave them this parable . " A man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard , and he came to look for fruit on it , but found none .
42013007	So he said to the gardener . " See , for years I have come looking for fruit on this tree , and found none . Cut it down . Why should it actually cumber the ground ?
42013008	" But the gardener answered him . Lord , let it alone this year also , till I have dug around it , and fertilized it .
42013009	" If after that it bears fruit , well and good ; but if not you shall cut it down . "
42013010	Once he was teaching in one of the synagogues , on the Sabbath ,

42013012	Jesus noticed her and called to him and said , " Woman , you are free from your weakness . "
42013013	Then he placed his hand on her , and she instantly stood upright and began to give glory to God .

42014001	It happened on the Sabbath Day when he went into the house of a certain ruler among Pharisees to take a meal , that they were watching him .

42014007	He told a parable to the guests when he noticed how they began choosing the best seats . He said to them .
42014008	" When you are invited by any one to a marriage-feast , do not sit down in the best seat , lest a guest more distinguished than yourself has been invited , and your host come to you and say ,
42014009	" Give place to this man , and then with mortification you proceed to take the lowest place .
42014010	" But when you are invited , go and sit down in the lowest place , so that when your host arrives he may say to you , My friend , come up higher . Then you will be honored before the other guest .
42014011	" For every one who exalts himself shall be humbled , and he who humbles himself shall be exalted . "

42014013	" But when you make a reception , invite the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind .

42014016	Jesus answered . " A certain man was making a great feast to which he invited many guests .

42014019	" The second said . I have bought five yolk of oxen and am on my way to try them . I pray that you will have me excused .

42014021	" So the slave came and presented all these answers to his master . Then the master of the house was indignant , and said to his slave . Go out , quickly , into the streets and alleys of the city , and bring in hither the poor , the maimed , the blind , the lame .

42014027	" Whoever does not carry his own cross and come after me , cannot be a disciple of mine .

42014029	" Lest it happen that after he has laid the foundations and is unable to complete it , all who see it shall begin to jeer at him saying ,
42014030	" This fellow began to build and could not finish .
42014031	" Or what king as he goes forth to join battle with another king in war does not sit down first and deliberate whether he can meet with ten thousand men the one who is advancing against him with twenty thousand ?
42014032	" If he cannot , while the other king is yet a great way off , he sends an embassy to ask conditions of peace .

42014034	" Salt is good , but if even the salt have lost its flavor , with what shall it be seasoned ?

42015001	Now all the tax-gatherers and sinners continued to draw near him , and to listen to him .

42015005	" And after he has found it , he lays it on his shoulder , rejoicing .

42015009	" And when she has found it , she calls together her woman friends and neighbors and say , Rejoice with me , for I have found the coin which I had lost .

42016001	To his disciples he said . " There was a certain rich man who had a steward , and this steward was accused to him of wasting his property .

42016004	" I know what I will do , so that when I am put out of my stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .

42019014	" But this fellow citizens hated him , and sent a deputation after him to say , We do not wish this man to become our king .
42019015	" And upon his return after he had secured the royal power , he ordered the slaves to whom he had given the money to be called in , so that he might know what they had gained by trading .
42019016	" And the first came before him , saying , Master , your pound has made ten pounds .
42019017	" And he said to him , Well done , good slave ! Because you have been faithful in a very little , have authority over ten cities .
42019018	" And the second came and said , Master , your pound has made five pounds .
42019019	" Then he said to him also , You shall be over five cities .
42019020	" And the next came to him and said , Here master is your pound which I was keeping safe in a napkin .
42019021	" For I was afraid of you , because you are a hard man . You take what you did not sow .
42019022	" He said to him , " By your own words I will Judge you , you wicked slave . You knew , did you , that I was a hard man taking up what I did not lay down , reaping what I did not sow .
42019023	" Then why did you not put my money into the bank , so that at my coming I might I might have gotten it back with interest ?
42019024	" Then to those who stood by , he said , Take the pounds from him and give it to him who has ten pounds .
42019025	" Master , they said to him , he already has ten pounds .
42019026	" I tell you that to every one who has it shall be given ; and from him who has not shall be taken away even what he has .

42019037	And when now he was coming near Jerusalem , and descending the Mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice , and to praise God with a loud voice for the almighty works they had seen .

42020001	On one of the days while he was teaching the people in the Temple and preaching the gospel , there came up the priest and the Scribes with the elders .
42020002	They spoke to him saying . " Tell us by what authority you are doing these things ? Who is it that gave you this authority ? "
42020003	" I will also ask you a question , " he replied .
42020004	" Was Johns baptism from heaven or from man ? "
42020005	So they reasoned among themselves . " If we say , From heaven , he will ask us , Why did you not believe in him ?
42020006	" And if we say , From man , all the people will stone us , for they were persuaded that Johnwas a prophet . "

42020010	" At harvest-time he sent a slave to the vine-dressers , to ask them to give him a share of the crop ; but the vine-dresser beat him and sent him away empty-handed .
42020011	" Then he sent another slave ; and him also they flogged and handled shamefully and sent him away empty-handed .
42020012	" Then he sent yet a third , and him to they wounded and threw him out .

42020030	" and the second and third took her ,
42020031	" and likewise all the seven , but left no children when they died .

42020038	" Now he is not the God of the dead , but of the living ; for to him all are alive .

42024013	On that same day two of his disciples were walking to Emmaus , a village about seven miles from Jerusalem .
42024014	They were talking together about all these events ,
42024015	and as they talked and discussed matter , Jesus himself drew near and began walking beside them .
42024016	But their eyes continued to be held that they should not recognize him even for an instant ,
42024017	And he said to them , " What words are these that you are exchanging one with another , as you walk along ? "
42024018	They stood still , looking sad . And one of them named Cleopas , answered him , " Do you sojourn alone in Jerusalem , that you do not know what things have been happening there these days ? "
42024019	" What kind of things ? " he answered . And they said . " The things concerning Jesus of Nazareth , who was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people ;
42024020	" and how our high priest and ruler delivered him to be condemned to death and crucified him .
42024021	" But we were hoping that it was he who should redeem Israel . Yes , and besides all this is the third day since these things happened .
42024022	" Moreover , some women of our company amazed us . They went to his tomb at daybreak ,
42024023	" and found that his body was not there ; then they came and told us that besides they had seen a vision of angels , who said that he was alive .
42024024	" Thereupon some of our own party to the tomb , and found it even so as the women had said , but him they did not see . "
42024025	" O foolish men , " said Jesus , " slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken !
42024026	" Behooved it not the Christ to suffer thus , and then to enter into his glory ? "
42024027	And beginning with Moses and the Prophets , he interpreted all the passages concerning himself .
42024028	When they drew near to the village to which they are were going , he appeared to be going farther .
42024029	But they urged him to stay with them , saying , " Abide with us , for it is toward evening , and the day is now far spent . "
42024030	So he went in to stay with them . But as he sat down with them , and took bread , and had blessed and broken it , and was handing it to them ,
42024031	their eyes were opened , and they recognized him , and he vanished out of their sight .
42024032	" Were not our hearts burning within us , " they said to each other , " while we were talking with him on the way , and he was opening to us the scriptures ? "
42024033	So they rose and returned to Jerusalem that very hour , and found the Eleven and the others all met together ,
42024034	saying , " The Lord is really risen , and has appeared to Simon ! "
42024035	Then they began to tell what happened on the road , and he was known to them when he broke the bread .
42024036	While they were yet speaking he stood among them and said , " Peace be to you ! "
42024037	They were startled and terrified and thought that they were seeing a ghost .
42024038	And he said to them . " Why are you disturbed ? And why do questions rise in your hearts ?
42024039	" Look at my hands and my feet . It is I ! Feel me and see ; for a ghost has not flesh and blood as I have . "
42024040	Then he showed them his hands and feet .
42024041	But while they still did not believe it for joy , and were filled with wonder , he asked them , " Have you anything here to eat ? "
42024042	So they gave him a piece of broiled fish ,
42024043	and he took it and ate it in their presence .
42024044	Then he said to them , " These are my words which I spoke to you while I was still with you , how all things must be fulfilled which are written in the Law of Moses , and the prophets , and the Psalms concerning me . "
42024045	Then he opened their minds to understand the Scriptures ,
42024046	and he said . " Thus it is written that the Christ should suffer and rise again from the dead , the third day ;
42024047	" and that repentance unto remission of sins should be preached in his name unto all the nations , beginning from Jerusalem .
42024048	" You must bear testimony to this .
42024049	" And I will send forth the promise of my Father upon you . But tarry in Jerusalem until you are clothed with power from on high . "
42024050	And he led them out until they were over against Bethany ; and he lifted up his hands and blessed them .
42024051	And it happened that while he was blessing them , that he parted from them and was carried into heaven .
42024052	And they worshiped him and returned to Jerusalem with great joy ,
42024053	and were continually in the temple , blessing God .
43001001	In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was face to face with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He was face to face with God in the Beginning .
43001003	All things came into being through him , and apart from him nothing that exists came into being .
43001004	In him was life , and the life was the light of men .
43001005	And the light is shining in the darkness , and the darkness has not overwhelmed it
43001006	A man came into being , sent from God , whose name was John .
43001007	He came as a witness , that he might bear testimony concerning the Light - so that all men might believe through him .
43001008	He was not the Light ; it was to bear testimony concerning the Light that he came into being .
43001009	The true Light , which enlightens every man , was then coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , and through him the world came into being , yet the world knew him not .
43001011	He came to his own creation , and his own folk welcomed him not .
43001012	But to all who receive him , to them he has given the right to become children of God , even to those who trust in his name ;
43001013	who were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
43001014	And the Word became flesh and tented with us . And we gazed on his glory - glory as of the Fathers only Son - full of grace and truth .
43001015	John bore witness concerning him , and cried aloud , saying , " This is he of whom I said , He who is coming after me has been put before me , for he was before me . "
43001016	For out of his fulness we have all received , yes , grace upon grace .
43001017	For the Law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No man has ever seen God ; God , only begotten , who is in the bosom of the Father - he has interpreted him .
43001019	Now this is the testimony of John , when the Jews sent some priests and Levites to him from Jerusalem to ask him , " Who are you ? "
43001020	He acknowledged - he did not deny it - but acknowledged , " I am not the Christ . "
43001021	" What then ? " they questioned ; " Are you Elijah ? " He said , " I am not . " " Are you the Prophet ? " " No , " he replied .
43001022	Then said they to him . " Who are you ? That we may give some answer to those who sent us . What account do you give of yourself ? "
43001023	He said , " I am a voice of one who cries aloud in the desert , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Isaiah . "
43001024	Now it was some of the Pharisees who had been sent to him ;
43001025	so they questioned him , saying , " Why then are you baptizing , if you are not the Christ , nor Elijah , nor the Prophet ? "
43001026	" I indeed am baptizing in water , " John said in reply , " but in your midst stands One whom you do not recognize ,
43001027	One who is to come after me , whose sandal-strap I am not worthy to untie . "
43001028	This happened in Bethany , beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
43001029	The next day he saw Jesus coming toward him , and said . " Behold , that is Gods Lamb , who takes and bears away the sin of the world .
43001030	This is he of whom I said , After me comes One who has been put before me , for he was before me .
43001031	I myself did not recognize him ; I only came baptizing in water , in order that he might be openly shown to Israel . "
43001032	John also bore this testimony , saying . " I saw the Spirit like a dove descend from heaven and rest upon him .
43001033	And I did not recognize him , but He who sent me to baptize in water said to me , The one on whom you see the Spirit descending and resting upon him , is he who baptizes in the Holy Spirit .
43001034	This I have seen , and I am become a witness to the fact that he is the Son of God . "
43001035	Next day again , John was standing with two of his disciples .
43001036	After gazing intently on Jesus as he walked about , he said , " Look ! that is the Lamb of God ! "
43001037	The two disciples heard his exclamation , and they followed Jesus .
43001038	Then Jesus turned and saw them following him , and said , " What do you want ? " They replied , " Rabbi " ( which may be translated Teacher ) , " where are you staying ? "
43001039	He said to them , " Come , and you shall see . " So they went and saw where he was staying , and spent that day with him . It was then about four oclock in the afternoon .
43001040	One of the two men who heard what John said and followed Jesus , was Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter .
43001041	In the morning he found his brother Simon , and said to him , " We have found the Messiah " ( a word which means Christ , the Anointed One ) .
43001042	He brought him to Jesus . Jesus looked intently at him and said . " You are Simon , son of John ; you shall be called Cephas " ( or Peter , which means Rock ) .
43001043	Next day Jesus decided to go into Galilee ; and he found Philip and said to him , " Follow me . "
43001044	Now Philip belonged to Bethsaida , the same town as Andrew and Peter .
43001045	Then Philip found Nathanael and told him , " We have found him about whom Moses wrote in the Law , as did the prophets - Jesus of Nazareth , Josephs son . "
43001046	And Nathanael said to him , " Can anything good come out of Nazareth ? " Philip said to him , " Come and see . "
43001047	Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him , and said , " Behold a true Israelite in whom there is no deceit . "
43001048	" How do you know me ? " asked Nathanael . " Before Philip called you , " replied Jesus , " when you were under the fig tree , I saw you . "
43001049	" Rabbi , " answered Nathanael , " you are the Son of God ; you are King of Israel . "
43001050	Jesus said in reply . " Do you believe because I said to you , I saw you under the fig tree ?
43001051	You shall see greater things than that ! Believe me , " he added , " you all shall see heaven opened wide , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man . "
43002001	Now two days after this there was a wedding in Cana of Galilee , and the mother of Jesus was there ;
43002002	Jesus also was invited to the wedding , and his disciples .
43002003	And when the wine ran short , Jesus mother said to him , " They have no wine . "
43002004	" Woman , " said Jesus , " what have you to do with me ? My time is not yet come . "
43002005	His mother said to the attendants , " Whatever he may tell you to do , do it . "
43002006	Now there were six stone water - jars standing there , according to the Jewish rites of purification , each holding about twenty gallons .
43002007	Jesus said , " Fill up the jars with water . "
43002008	So they filled them brimful . Then he said , " Draw some out now , and carry it to the master of the feast . "
43002009	So they carried it . And when the master of the feast had tasted of the water which had been made wine , not knowing where it came from , though the attendants who had drawn it knew , he called the bridegroom and said to him .
43002010	" Everybody serves first the good wine , and when people have drunk freely , the poor wine ; but you have kept the good wine until now . "
43002011	This beginning of signs Jesus performed in Cana of Galilee , and showed forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him there .
43002012	Afterward he went down to Capernaum , he and his mother and his brothers and his disciples , and remained there a few days .
43002013	Now the Passover of the Jews was near , so Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43002014	There he found in the temple those who were selling cattle and sheep and doves , and the money-changers sitting there .
43002015	So he plaited a scourge of rushes , and drove all out of the temple - both the sheep and oxen . He began to pour out the coins of the money-changers , and to overturn their tables ,
43002016	and said to those who were selling doves . " Take these things away ! Make not my Fathers house a house of trade !
43002017	His disciples recalled that it is written , The zeal of thine house will devour me .
43002018	Then the Jews asked Jesus , " What sign are you going to show us , seeing that you do these things ? "
43002019	" Destroy this temple , " answered Jesus , " and in three days I will raise it up . "
43002020	The Jews retorted , " This Temple took forty-six years to build , and will you raise it in three days ? "
43002021	But he was speaking about the temple of his body ; and when the disciples recalled what he had said ,
43002022	after he had been raised from the dead , they believed the Scripture and the word which Jesus had said .
43002023	Now when he was in Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover , many believed in his name , when they beheld the signs which he did ;
43002024	but for his part Jesus was not trusting himself to them , because he knew all men ,
43002025	and did not need any ones testimony concerning man , for he himself knew what was in man .
43003001	Now there was one of the Pharisees named Nicodemus , a ruler among the Jews .
43003002	This man came to Jesus by night , and said to him . " Rabbi , we know that you are a teacher sent from God ; for no man can do these signs which you are continually doing , unless God is with him . "
43003003	" In very truth I tell you , " answered Jesus , " that unless a man is born from above , he cannot see the kingdom of God . "
43003004	" How can a man be born when he is old ? " Nicodemus replied ; " Can he enter a second time into his mothers womb , and be born ? "
43003005	" I tell you solemnly , " Jesus answered , " that unless a man is born of water and the Spirit , he cannot enter the kingdom of God .
43003006	What is born of the flesh is flesh ; and what is born of the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	Marvel not at my telling you , You must all be born again from above .
43003008	The wind blows where it wills , and you hear its voice , but you do not know where it comes from or where it is going . So it is with every one who has been born of the Spirit . "
43003009	" How can this be ? " said Nicodemus in reply .
43003010	" Are you the Teacher of Israel , and yet you do not understand these things ? " said Jesus .
43003011	" Most solemnly I tell you we are speaking of what we know , and it is about that of which we were eyewitnesses that we give testimony . Yet all of you reject our testimony .
43003012	If I have told you earthly things and yet none of you believe me , how will you believe if I tell you concerning heavenly things ?
43003013	There is no one gone up to heaven , except the One who came down from heaven - the Son of man himself .
43003014	And just as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , so must the Son of man be lifted up ,
43003015	in order that every one who believes in him may have eternal life .
43003016	" For God so loved the world that he gave his only begotten Son , that whoever trusts in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
43003017	For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world , but that the world through him might be saved .
43003018	He who trusts in him is not condemned , but he who does not trust has already been condemned , because he has not put his trust in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
43003019	And this is the condemnation , that Light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
43003020	For every one who practises wrong hates light , and does not come to the light , lest his actions be exposed ;
43003021	but he who does what is true , comes to the light , in order that his actions may be shown to have been wrought in God . "
43003022	After this Jesus and his disciples went into the countryside of Judea , and there he was staying with them and baptizing .

43003024	( For John had not yet been thrown into prison . )

43003027	In reply John said . " A man cannot obtain anything unless it has been granted to him from heaven .

43003029	He who has the bride is the bridegroom , but the friend of the bridegroom , who stands and hears him , rejoices greatly because of the bridegrooms voice . So then this joy of mine has now complete fulfilment .
43003030	He must increase , but I must decrease .
43003031	" He that comes from above is above all ; but one who is of the earth , of the earth he is , and of the earth he speaks . He who comes from heaven is above all .
43003032	He bears testimony to what he has heard and seen , yet no one receives his testimony .
43003033	Whoever does receive it has set his seal that God is true .

43003036	Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life , but he who disobeys the Son shall not see life , but he who disobeys the Son shall not see life , but the wrath of God abides upon him . "
43004001	Accordingly when the Lord knew that the Pharisees had heard it said , " Jesus is making and baptizing more disciples than John , "
43004002	( though Jesus himself was not accustomed to baptize , but his disciples ) ,

43004004	Now he had to pass through Samaria ;
43004005	so he came to a city of Samaria called Sychar , near the piece of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacobs Spring was there . So Jesus , tired out with his journey , was sitting thus by the spring .
43004007	It was about noon , and a woman of Samaria came to draw water .
43004008	Jesus said to her , " Give me a drink " ( for his disciples were gone away into the city to buy food . )
43004009	" How is it , " answered the Samaritan woman , " that you who are a Jew ask a drink from me , a woman , and a Samaritan ? " ( For Jews have no dealings with Samaritans . )
43004010	" If you had known the free gift of God , " Jesus answered , " and who it is that says to you , Give me a drink , you would have asked of him , and he would have given you living water . "
43004011	" Sir , " said the woman , " you have nothing to draw with , and the well is deep ; whence have you that living water ?
43004012	Surely you are not greater than our Father Jacob , who gave us the well , and used to drink from it himself , and his sons , and his cattle , too ? "
43004013	" All who drink of this water , " Jesus answered , " will thirst again ;
43004014	but whoever once drinks of the water that I will give him , shall never thirst any more , but the water that I will give him shall become a living spring of water within him , welling up into eternal life . "
43004015	" Sir ! " exclaimed the woman , " give me this water , so that I may not be thirsty , nor come all this way to draw water . "
43004016	Jesus said to her , " Go , call your husband , and then come here . "
43004017	" I have no husband , " answered the woman . " You are right in saying I have no husband , " Jesus said to her ,
43004018	" for you have had five husbands , and the man you now have is not your husband ; in this you have spoken truly . "
43004019	" I see , Sir , that you are a prophet , " replied the woman .
43004020	" Our forefathers worshiped in this mountain , yet you Jews say that in Jerusalem is the place where one must worship . "
43004021	" Woman , believe me , " said Jesus , " that the hour is coming when neither in this mountain nor in Jerusalem will you worship the Father .
43004022	You are worshiping something you do not know . we know what we worship , for salvation comes from the Jews .
43004023	But an hour is coming , and is now here , when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and in truth . For the Father is seeking such as his worshipers .
43004024	God is spirit , and those who worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth . "
43004025	" I know , " said the woman , " that Messiah is coming , who is called the Christ ; when he has come he will tell us everything . "
43004026	Jesus said to her , " I who am now talking to you , am he . "
43004027	Just then his disciples came up , and were astonished that he was talking with a woman ; yet not one of them asked him , " What do you want ? " or " Why are you talking with her ? "
43004028	Then the woman left her water-jar , and went away into the city and began saying to the people .
43004029	" Come ! see a man who has told me everything that I ever did . He cant be the Christ , can he ? "
43004030	They left the city and set out to go to him .
43004031	Meanwhile the disciples kept urging him .
43004032	" Rabbi , " they said , " eat something . " But he answered , " I have food to eat of which you know nothing . "
43004033	So the disciples began to say to one another , " Can any one have brought him something to eat ? "
43004034	Jesus said to them . " My food is to do the will of Him who sent me , and to accomplish his work .
43004035	Do you not say , It wants yet four months , and then comes the harvest ? Look , I tell you ! Lift up your eyes and behold the fields , that they are already white for harvest .
43004036	The reaper is already receiving wages and gathering a crop for eternal life , so that the sower and the reaper may rejoice together .
43004037	For in this respect the saying is true , One sows , another reaps .

43004046	So he came back again to Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . Now there was one of the kings officers whose son was lying ill at Capernaum .

43004048	Then Jesus said to him , " Unless you all see signs and wonders , you will not believe . "
