60003008	Finally , you should all be harmonious , sympathetic , loving as brothers , tender-hearted , humble-minded ;
60003009	not paying back evil for evil or abuse for abuse , but on the contrary giving a blessing . Because for this you have been called - to inherit a blessing .
60003010	He who would love life and enjoy happy days , Let him keep his tongue from evil , And his lips from speaking guile ;
60003011	Let him turn from evil and do good , Let him seek peace , and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous , And his ears are open to their cry ; But the face of the Lord is set against evil-doers .
60003013	Yet who will harm you if you become zealous for the good ?
60003014	But even if you should suffer in behalf of righteousness , you are happy . Do not be afraid of their terror , neither be troubled .
60003015	But consecrate Christ in your hearts , as Lord . Be always in readiness to make and answer to any one who asks you a reason for the hope that is within you , yet with gentleness and reverence .
60003016	See that you have a clear conscience , so that , although they speak of you as evil-doers , these libelers of your good Christian lives may be ashamed .
60003017	For it is better that you suffer for doing right , if such be Gods will , than for doing wrong ;
60003018	because Christ also once for all suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God . He was put to death in the flesh , but make alive in spirit .
60003019	( It was in spirit that he went and preached the Word to the spirits who were in prison ,
60003020	who in old times had been disobedient , when Gods longsuffering was waiting in the days of Noah , while an ark was building , in which a few persons - eight in number - were saved by water . )
60003021	Baptism , the counterpart of that , now saves you ( not the washing off of the filth of the flesh , but the prayer for a good conscience toward God ) , through the resurrection of Jesus Christ .
60003022	He is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; to Him angels and authorities and powers have been made subject .
60004001	Since , then , Christ suffered in the flesh , do you also ever arm yourselves with the same mind ( because he who has suffered in the flesh has done with sin ) ,
60004002	so that in future you may not spend your life in the flesh according to mens desires , but in the will of God .
60004003	For the time past of life may suffice us to have worked the will of the Gentiles , when we spent our life in lasciviousness , lusts , hard drinking , revelry , banqueting , and abominable idol worship .
60004004	They are astonished at this , that you do not run into the same excesses of profligacy as they do ; and they speak evil of you .
60004005	But they must render account to Him who stands ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	The gospel was preached for this cause to those who were dead also , that they might be judged according to men in flesh , but live according to God in spirit .
60004007	But the end of all things is close at hand ; so be sober , watch and pray .
60004008	Above everything have fervent love to one another ; for love veils a multitude of sins .
60004009	Be hospitable to one another , without grudging .
60004010	Whatever the gifts which each has received , use them for one another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
60004011	If any one preaches , let him always preach as one who utters Gods truth ; if any one serves another , let it be with the strength which God supplies ; so that in every way God may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be glory and dominion for ever and ever , Amen .
60004012	Do not think it strange , beloved , that a fiery ordeal has come to test you , as though some surprising thing had befallen you .
60004013	But be glad in the degree in which you share in the sufferings of Christ ; so that when his glory shall be revealed , you too may be glad with triumphant gladness .
60004014	If you are being reproached for the name of Christ , you are blessed , for the spirit of glory and of God is resting upon you .
60004015	But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evil-doer , or as a spy upon other peoples business .
60004016	But if any man is suffering as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him ever glorify God in this Name .
60004017	It is time for judgment to begin with the household of God ; and if it first begin with us , what shall be the end of those who are disobedient to the gospel ?
60004018	If the righteous man is scarcely saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
60004019	So let those who are suffering according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well-doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
60005001	Now to you who are presbyters I make this appeal ; for I am myself a presbyter , and was a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory about to be revealed .
60005002	Be shepherds to your flock of God ; take charge of them willingly , and not through compulsion ; not for filthy lucre , but with a willing mind ;
60005003	not by way of lording it over your heritage , but by becoming examples to the flock .
60005004	Then , when the Chief Shepherd shall appear , you too will receive the fadeless wreath of glory .
60005005	You younger men must submit to the presbyters ; and all of you must put on the garment of humility and serve one another , for God resists the haughty , But gives grace to the humble .
60005006	So humble yourselves under Gods mighty hand , so that he may exalt you in due time .
60005007	Cast all your care upon him , for he ever cares for you .
60005008	Be temperate , be vigilant ; because your enemy , the devil , is prowling about like a roaring lion , seeking whom he may devour .
60005009	Resist him , standing firm in the faith , knowing well that the same afflictions are being accomplished in your brothers that are in the world .
60005010	But the God of all grace , who has called us by Christ Jesus to share his eternal glory , will , after you have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
60005011	His is the dominion forever and ever ; Amen .
60005012	By Sylvanus , a faithful brother of yours , as I suppose , I have written you briefly , to comfort you , and to testify that this is the true grace of God . In this stand fast .
60005013	Your sister church in Babylon , elect with you , sends you salutations , and so does Marcus , my son .
60005014	Salute one another with a kiss of love . Peace be to you all who are in Christ Jesus .
61001001	Simon Peter , a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who have obtained an equally precious faith with us in the righteousness of our God and Saviour Jesus Christ .
61001002	Grace and peace be multiplied to you by the God and Father of Jesus our Lord .
61001003	For his power divine has granted to us everything needful for life and godliness , through the knowledge of him who called us by his own glory and virtue .
61001004	By these he has granted his promises to us , precious and splendid ; so that through them you may become partners of the divine nature , now that you have escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
61001005	For this very reason do your best to add to your faith manliness , and to manliness knowledge ,
61001006	and to knowledge self-control , and to self-control stedfastness , and to stedfastness piety ,
61001007	and to piety brotherly love , and to brotherly love , love itself .
61001008	For if these virtues are yours in abounding measure , they render you not idle nor unfruitful , until you come into the full knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	For the man who lacks these virtues is blind , short-sighted , forgetful of his cleansing from his old sins .
61001010	So , brothers , take diligent care to make your calling and election sure ; for if you do this , you will never stumble .
61001011	For so the entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ will be richly supplied to you .
61001012	I shall therefore be always ready to remind you of all this , even though you know it , and are firmly founded in the truth which is with you .
61001013	So I think it right , as long as I am in this " tent , " to rouse you by way of reminding you ,
61001014	since I know that the time for me to strike tent comes swiftly on , even as our Lord Jesus Christ pointed out to me .
61001015	So I will do my best to enable you , even after my departure , continually to call these things to mind .
61001016	For we were not following cunningly devised fables , when we told you of the power and presence of our Lord Jesus Christ , but we had been eye-witnesses of his Majesty .
61001017	For he did receive honor and glory from God the Father , when there was borne such a voice to him from the Majestic Glory , This is my Son , my Beloved , in whom I delight ;
61001018	and this voice we ourselves heard , borne to us out of heaven , when we were with him on the holy hill .
61001019	And so we possess the word of prophecy made yet more sure . Unto this you do well to give heed as to a lamp shining in a dark place , till the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts .
61001020	But first be assured of this - that no prophecy of Scripture is of private interpretation .
61001021	For no prophecy was ever brought by the will of man ; but moved by the Holy Spirit , men spoke for God .
61002001	But there were false prophets , too , among the people , just as among you also there will be false teachers . These will secretly bring in destructive sects , denying even the Master who bought them , and bringing swift ruin upon themselves .
61002002	Then there will be many who will follow their immorality , because of whom the Way of the Truth will be maligned .
61002003	In their covetousness , with cunning words , they will make merchandise of you ; those whose doom has not been idle from of old , and whose destruction has not been slumbering .
61002004	For if God did not spare angels when they sinned , but cast them down to Tartarus , and committed them to chains of darkness , and reserved them for judgment ;
61002005	if he did not spare the ancient world , but preserved Noah , a herald of righteousness , with seven others , when he brought a flood upon an ungodly world ;
61002006	if he condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah and reduced them to ashes , thus holding them up as a warning to all who would live ungodly ;
61002007	and he delivered righteous Lot who was worn out by the lascivious life of the wicked
61002008	( for that righteous man , living among them , tormented his righteous soul in seeing and hearing , day after day , their lawless deeds ) ,
61002009	then be sure that the Lord knows how to deliver the godly out of temptation , and to keep the wicked ( who are even now enduring punishment ) for the " Day of Judgment " ;
61002010	especially those who spend their lives following the flesh in the lust of defilement , and in despising all authority . Audacious and wilful , they feel no awe in railing against dignities ;
61002011	even where angels , though surpassing them in strength and might , do not bring a railing judgment against them before the Lord .
61002012	But these men , like irrational creatures , mere animals , born to be taken and destroyed , continually rail about matters of which they know nothing . In their corruption they will surely be destroyed ,
61002013	suffering wrong as the wage of wrong which they have done . These are men who count it pleasure to carouse in open daylight ; they are spots and blemishes reveling in their deceit , even while they are feasting with you .
61002014	They have eyes full of harlots , eyes that cannot stop sinning . They entice unsteady souls . Their heart is trained in greed . They are an accursed generation .
61002015	They have forsaken the right way ; they have lost their way , and followed the road of Balaam , the son of Beor , who loved the wages of wrong-doing .
61002016	He was , however , rebuked for his own transgression ; a dumb ass spoke with a mans voice , and stopped the madness of the prophet .
61002017	Such men are like waterless springs , or mists storm-driven ; for them the blackness of darkness has been reserved .
61002018	For speaking great swelling words of vanity , they entangle , by their lasciviousness , in the lusts of the flesh , those who are just about to escape from the men that live in misconduct .
61002019	They promise them liberty , while they themselves are slaves of rottenness ! ( For indeed a man is the slave of anything which masters him . )
61002020	For if , after having escaped the pollutions of the world , through the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , men are again entangled in them and overpowered , their last state is become worse than their first .
61002021	Indeed it would have been better for them not to have known the Way of Righteousness , than , after knowing it , to turn back from the holy command delivered to them .
61002022	In their case it has happened according to the true proverb , The dog returns again to his own vomit , and The sow , after washing , to her wallowing in the mire .
61003001	This is now my second letter to you , beloved . In both of them I am stirring up your pure minds by putting you in remembrance .
61003002	I want you to recollect the words that were foretold by the holy prophets , and the command of your Lord and Saviour , given you through your apostles .
61003003	Know this first , that mockers will come in the last days , in their mockery , men who walk the way of their own lusts
61003004	and say , " Where is the promise of His coming ? For since the day that our fathers fell asleep everything continues as it was from the beginning of the creation . "
61003005	For they willingly ignore the fact that there were heaven , from of old , and an earth formed out of water and through water , by the word of God ;
61003006	and that by the same means the world which then existed was destroyed by a deluge of water .
61003007	But the heavens and earth that now are , by the same word of God , have been reserved for fire , and are being kept for the Day of Judgment , and for the destruction of ungodly men .
61003008	Do not forget this one thing , beloved , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
61003009	The Lord does not loiter over his promise , as some men esteem loitering ; but he is longsuffering toward you , not purposing that any should perish , but that all should pass on to repentance .
61003010	But the Day of the Lord will come like a thief ; and on that Day the heavens will vanish with a crash , the heavenly bodies will melt with fervent heat , and the earth and all its works will be burned up .
61003011	Now since all things are in the process of dissolution , what kind of men ought you to be , in all holy living and piety ;
61003012	while you look for and hasten the coming of the Day of God . At its coming the heavens , being on fire , will be dissolved , and the heavenly bodies will melt with fervent heat .
61003013	But according to his promise , we are looking for new heavens and a new earth , in which righteousness makes her dwelling .
61003014	And so , beloved , since you are looking for these things , continually give diligence that you may be found in peace , unspotted and blameless in his sight .
61003015	Regard our Lords longsuffering as salvation ; even as our dear brother Paul also wrote to you , according to the wisdom given to him .
61003016	It is the same in all his letters when he speaks of these things . There are indeed some things in his letters hard to understand , which the ignorant and the shifty wrest , as also they do the other Scriptures , to their own destruction .
61003017	Do you therefore , beloved , because you know these things beforehand , be on your guard lest you be led astray by the error of the wicked , and so fall from your own stedfastness .
61003018	But grow continually in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . To Him be the glory both now and unto the Day of Eternity , Amen .
62001001	It is of what has existed from the beginning , of what we have listened to , of what we have seen with our own eyes , of what we have witnessed and touched with our own heads , it is concerning the Logos of Life that we are now writing .
62001002	And the Life was made visible , and we have seen it and are bearing witness , and are bringing you word of that Eternal Life which was face to face with the Father and was made visible to us .
62001003	It is what we have seen and heard that we are announcing to you , in order that you also may have partnership with us ; and our partnership is with the Father and with his Son , Jesus Christ .
62001004	And we are writing all this to you that our joy may be complete .
62001005	This , then , is the message that we have heard from him , and are announcing to you , that God is light , and no darkness what ever is in him .
62001006	If we say , " We have partnership with Him , " when we are passing our life in the darkness , we are lying and are not doing the truth .
62001007	But is we are passing our life in the light , as he is in the light , we ever have partnership with one another , and the blood of Jesus Christ is cleansing us from every sin .
62001008	If we say , " We have no sin , " we are deceiving ourselves and the truth is not in us .
62001009	But if we confess our sins , faithful is he and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all wrong-doing .
62001010	If we say , " We have not sinned , " we are making him a liar , and his word is not in us .
62002001	My children , I am writing this to you that you may not continue to sin ; but if any one sin , we ever have a Comforter before the Father , Jesus Christ the Righteous .
62002002	And he is the propitiation for our sins , and not for ours only , but also for those of the whole world .
62002003	This is how we may know that we have come to know Him , by always keeping his commandments .
62002004	He who says , " I know Him , " but does no continue obeying his commandments , is a liar ,
62002005	and the truth is not in him ; bit if any man obey his word , in him truly is the love of God made perfect . By this we come to know that we are in him .
62002006	By who says he " remains in him " ought to spend his life as he spent his .
62002007	Beloved , I am not writing a new commandment to you , nay , and old commandment , which you have had from the beginning . That old commandment is the message to which you have listened .
62002008	Yet again it is a new commandment which I am writing to you , which is true in him and is you ; because the darkness is passing away , and the true light is already shining .
62002009	He who says he is in the light , and hates his brother , is in darkness even until now .
62002010	But he who loves his brother is abiding in the light , and in it there is no cause of stumbling .
62002011	But he who hates his brother is in the darkness , and is spending his life in the darkness , and does not know where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I am writing to you , little children , because you sins are forgiven you for his names sake .
62002013	I am writing to you , fathers , because you have come to know him who is from the beginning . I am writing to you , young men , because you have fully overcome the Evil One . I have written to you , little children , because you have learned to know the father .
62002014	I have written to you , fathers , because you have learned to know him who is from the beginning . I have written to you , young men , because you are strong , and the word of God is abiding in you , and you have fully overcome the Evil One .
62002015	Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
62002016	For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the proud glory of life , is not from the Father , but from the world ;
62002017	and the world and its lusts are passing away , but he who ever does the will of God abides forever .
62002018	My children , this is the last hour , and as you have heard that an antichrist was coming , and now many antichrists are already risen , whence we may know that it is the last hour .
62002019	They came forth from us , but they did not belong to us . If they had belonged to us they would certainly have remained with us , but they went out that they might be manifest that they all are not of us .
62002020	Now you have an anointing from the Holy One , and you know all things .
62002021	I am not writing to you because you do not know the truth , but because you do know it , and know that no lie is of the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar if not the man who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This is the Antichrist , even he who disowns the Father and the Son .
62002023	Whoever denies the Son , the same has not the Father ; but he who confesses the Son has the Father also . As for you , let what you have heard from the beginning abide in you .
62002024	If what you have heard from the beginning is abiding in you , you also will ever abide in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	And this is the promise which he has promised to us even life eternal .
62002026	I have written this to you concerning those who would lead you astray .
62002027	As to you , the unction you received from him remains ever in you , and you need no teaching from any one . But since his unction teaches you concerning all things and is true , and is no lie , abide continually in him , as it has taught you to do .
62002028	And now continue to abide in him , my children , so that when he shall appear we may have cheerful confidence and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
62002029	If you know that he is righteous you know also that every one who habitually practises righteousness has been born of him .
62003001	Behold what manner of love the Father has given us in allowing us to be called " Children of God ! " And that is what we are . For this reason the world does not recognize us , because it did not know him .
62003002	We are Gods children now , beloved ; what we shall be has never yet been made manifest . But we know that when he is manifested we shall be like him ; for we shall see him even as he is .
62003003	And every one who is holding this hope in him is purifying himself , even as he is pure .
62003004	Every one who commits sin commits also lawlessness . Sin is lawlessness .
62003005	And you know that he was manifested to take away sins ; and in him is no sin .
62003006	Whoever continually abides in him does not habitually sin ; whoever lives in sin has not seen him , nor come to know him .
62003007	My children , let no one deceive you ; he who is working righteousness is righteous , just as he is righteous .
62003008	He who is committing sin is of the devil , because from the beginning of the devil is sinning . It was for this cause that the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Whoever is a child of God cannot go on sinning , because his seed is abiding in him ; and he cannot go on sinning because he is a child of God .
62003010	In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil ; for every one who does not work righteousness is not a child of God , nor is he who does not love his brother .
62003011	For this is the message that you have listened to from the beginning , " WE ARE TO LOVE ONE ANOTHER . "
62003012	We are not to be like Cain , who belonged to the Evil One , and murdered his brother . And why did he murder him ? It was because his own deeds were evil , and his brothers , righteous .
62003013	Do not wonder , brothers , if the world continues to hate you .
62003014	We know that we have migrated , out of death into life , because we love our brothers . He who has no love is abiding in death .
62003015	Every one who is hating his brother is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him .
62003016	By this we learn to know love , because he laid down his life for us ; so we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers .
62003017	But whoever has this worlds goods , and beholds his brother in need , and shuts up his heart against him , how can the love of God continue to abide in him ?
62003018	My children , let us not love in word nor in talk , but in deed and in truth .
62003019	By this we shall come to know that we are really of the truth ,
62003020	and shall persuade our heart in his presence whenever our heart condemns us , because God is greater than our heart and knows all things .
62003021	Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , we have confidence toward God ,
62003022	and whatever we ask we are receiving from him , because we are keeping his commandments and doing those things that are pleasing in his sight .
62003023	His commandment is this , that we should believe in the name of his Son , Jesus Christ , and love one another as he has commanded us to do .
62003024	He who keeps his commandments is abiding in Him , and Christ in him . By this we know that Christ is abiding in us , by the Spirit which he has given us .
62004001	Do not believe every spirit , beloved , but test the spirits to see whether they are of God ; for many false prophets are gone out into the world .
62004002	By this you know the Spirit of God ; every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is from God ;
62004003	and every spirit which confesses him not , is not from God . And this is that spirit of Antichrist of which you have heard that it is coming , and that now it is already in the world .
62004004	My little children , you are of God and have conquered them ; because he that is within you is greater than he that is in the world .
62004005	They are of the world , and for this reason they speak as of the world , and the world listens to them .
62004006	But you are of God . He who is beginning to know God listens to us ; he who is not of God does not listen to us . By this we may distinguish the spirit of truth from the spirit of error .
62004007	Beloved , let us love one another ; for love is of God ; and every one that loves us a child of God .
62004008	He who does not love , does not know God ; for God is love .
62004009	In this was the love of God clearly shown toward us , by his sending his only Son into the world , so that we might live through him .
62004010	In this is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be a propitiation for our sins .
62004011	If God so loved us , beloved , we also ought to love one another .
62004012	No man has ever gazed on God ; but if we love one another , God ever abides in us , and his love is perfected in us .
62004013	By this we come to know that we are abiding in him , and he in us , because he has given us of his Spirit ;
62004014	and we have beheld and do testify that the Father has sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
62004015	If any man confesses that " Jesus is the Son of God . " God is abiding in that man , and he in God .
62004016	And we do know and have believed the love which God has for us . God is love ; and he who is abiding in love is abiding in God , and God is abiding in him .
62004017	In this is love made perfect with us , so that we may have cheerful confidence in the Day of Judgment , because we are living in this world as He lives .
62004018	Fear does not exist in love ; but love , when it is perfect , drives out fear . For fear has always torment , and he who has fear is not yet perfected in love .
62004019	We love because He loved us first .
62004020	If any one says , " I love God , " and yet hates his brother , he is a liar ; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen , cannot possibly love God , whom he has not seen .
62004021	And we have this command from God . HE WHO LOVES GOD IS TO LOVE HIS BROTHER ALSO .
62005001	Every one who believes that Jesus is the Christ is a child of God ; and every one who loves the Father , loves him also who is the Fathers Child .
62005002	By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God and obey his commandments .
62005003	For love to God means obeying his commandments ; and his commandments are not irksome .
62005004	For whoever is a child of God is overcoming the world ; and our faith is the victory that has overcome the world .
62005005	And who it the one that is overcoming the world if not the man who believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	Jesus Christ is he who came by water and blood , not by the water only , but by the water and by the blood . The spirit is he who bears testimony , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	For there are three who bear testimony , the Spirit , and the water ,
62005008	and the blood ; and the three are one .
62005009	If we accept mens testimony , the testimony of God is greater ; for this is the testimony of God , that he has borne testimony concerning his Son .
62005010	He who believes on the Son of God has the testimony in himself . He who does not believe God , has made him a liar , because he has not believed in the testimony that God has borne concerning his Son .
62005011	And the testimony is this , " God has given us eternal life , and this life is in his Son . "
62005012	He who has the Son has the life ; he who has not the Son of God has not the life .
62005013	I have written these words to you so that you may know that you have eternal life , you who believe in the name of the Son of God .
62005014	Now the confidence which we have in him is this , that he listens to us whenever we ask anything that is in accordance with his will .
62005015	And if we know that he is listening to us in what ever we are asking , we know that we obtain the petitions which we have made to him .
62005016	If any one sees his brother committing a sin that is not deadly , he shall ask , and God will give him life , for any one who is not committing a deadly sin . There is a deadly sin ; concerning that I do not say that he should pray .
62005017	All unrighteousness is sin ; and there is sin that is not deadly .
62005018	We know that whoever is a child of God is not habitually committing sin ; but he who is Gods child guards himself , and the Evil One never touches him .
62005019	We know that we are of God , and the whole world is lying in the Evil One .
62005020	And we know that the Son of God is come , and has granted us and understanding , so that we may come to know him who is true . And we are in him who is true , even in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and life eternal .
62005021	My little children , guard yourselves from idols .
63001001	The Elder to the Elect Lady and her children , whom I love in truth , and not only I , but also all those who have come to know the truth .
63001002	I love you for the sake of the truth which is abiding in us and will be with us forever .
63001003	Grace , mercy , and peace will be with us from God the Father , and from Jesus Christ the Fathers Son , in truth and love .
63001004	I am greatly rejoiced to find some of your children leading their lives in truth , even as we received commandment from the Father .
63001005	And now I am entreating you , Lady , not as though I were writing some new commandment to you , but one which we have had from the beginning , let us love one another .
63001006	And this is love , that we should lead our lives according to his commandments . This is the commandment , even as you heard from the beginning , that you should pass your life in love .
63001007	I say this because many deceivers are gone forth into the world , those who deny the coming of Jesus Christ in the flesh . This is the deceiver and the Antichrist .
63001008	Watch yourselves , that you do not lose what we have wrought , but that you receive a full reward .
63001009	Whoever is going ahead , and is not abiding in the teachings of Christ , does not possess God ; but he who is abiding in the teaching possesses both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If any one come to you and does not bring this teaching , do not receive him into your house , nor give him any greeting .
63001011	For the man who greets him shares in his wicked work .
63001012	I have many things to write to you , but I would not write them with paper and ink . I hope to come to you and to talk with you face to face , so that your joy may be full .
63001013	The children of your elect sister send you greeting .
64001001	The Elder to the beloved Gaius , whom I love in the truth .
64001002	I pray that you may prosper , beloved , in every way , and be in good health , even as your soul is prospering .
64001003	For I was glad when brothers came and bore testimony to your truth , as indeed you are passing your life in truth .
64001004	I have no greater joy than this , to hear that my children are passing their lives in the truth .
64001005	You are acting faithfully , beloved , in whatever you are doing for the brothers and the strangers .
64001006	They have borne testimony to your love before the church . You will do well to speed them on their way worthily of God ;
64001007	since for the sake of the Name they have started out , taking nothing from the Gentiles .
64001008	Hence we ought to support such , so that we may become fellow workers for the truth .
64001009	I have written somewhat to the church ; but Diotrephes , who love to take the lead among them , does not receive me .
64001010	Do them when I come I will recall to mind the deeds which he is doing , prating against me with wicked words . Not satisfied with that , he refuses to receive the brothers , forbids those that would receive them , and excommunicates them from the church .
64001011	Do not imitate what is evil , beloved , but that which is good . He who does good is of God ; he who does evil has never gazed on God .
64001012	All men bear testimony to Demetrius , and so does the truth itself . I also bear testimony to him ; and you know that my testimony is true .
64001013	I have a great deal to write to you , but I do not want to write you with pen and ink .
64001014	I am hoping soon to see you , and then we shall talk face to face . Peace be to you ! The friends send their salutation . Salute the friends by name .
64001015	
65001001	Jude , a slave of Jesus Christ , and a brother of James . To those who are in God , the Father beloved , kept for Jesus Christ , and called .
65001002	May mercy and peace and love be multiplied to you .
65001003	Beloved , although I was making all haste to write to you in regard to our common salvation , I am compelled to write you an appeal to defend the faith once for all committed to the saints .
65001004	For certain men have crept in stealthily - men predestined in ancient prophecies for this condemnation - impious ones ! They pervert the grace of our God into licentiousness , and deny Jesus Christ , our sole Master and Lord .
65001005	I wish to remind you of what you already know right well , that although the Lord once saved a people out of the land of Egypt , he afterward destroyed those who did not believe ;
65001006	while the angels who did not keep their first domain but left their proper abode , are held by him in blank darkness , in everlasting chains , in preparation for the judgment of the Great Day .
65001007	So also Sodom and Gomorrah and the near-by cities which in like manner glutted themselves in sensuality and unnatural vice , are exhibited as a warning of the eternal fire , in the punishment they undergo .
65001008	Yet in just the same way these dreamers also defile the flesh , while they set at naught dominion and scoff at dignities .
65001009	But Michael , the Archangel , when in contending with the devil , he was disputing about the body of Moses , did not dare to pronounce sentence for blasphemy , but said , " The Lord rebuke you . "
65001010	Yet these men blaspheme about matters of which they know nothing , while they use such things as they do understand by instinct ( like the animals who have no reason ) for their own destruction .
65001011	Alas for them ! They have walked in the path of Cain ; for the sake of gain they have rushed headlong into Balaams error , and have perished in Korahs rebellion .
65001012	These are they who are stains upon your love-feasts ; when they feast sumptuously without scruple , looking after none but themselves . They are clouds without water , driven along by the winds ; trees of autumn , fruitless , doubly dead , torn up by the roots ,
65001013	wild waves of the sea , foaming out their own shame ; wandering stars , for whom is reserved the blackness of darkness forever .
65001014	It was to these , too , that Enoch , the " seventh in descent from Adam , " prophesied , saying , " Lo ! the Lord is come with myriads of his saints ,
65001015	to execute judgment upon all , and to convict all the ungodly of all the ungodly deeds which in their ungodliness they have committed ; and of all the hard things which they have spoken against Him , ungodly sinners that they are ! "
65001016	For these are murmurers , always complaining . They always go where their passions lead , and their mouth speaks great swelling words , while they pay court to men for the sake of the advantage they can get .
65001017	But as for you , dearly beloved , remember the words spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65001018	how they used to say to you , " In the last times there will be scoffers who will be led only by their godless passions . "
65001019	These are the men , sensual and unspiritual , who cause divisions .
65001020	But you , beloved , continually building yourselves up on your most holy faith , and ever praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	must keep yourselves in the love of God , while waiting for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ , which ends in life eternal .
65001022	Pity some who are wavering , and save by dragging them out of the fire ;
65001023	others pity , but with caution , hating even the garment spotted by the flesh .
65001024	Now unto Him who has power to guard you from stumbling , and to make you stand in the presence of his glory , faultless and exultant ,
65001025	to the only God , our Saviour , through Jesus Christ our Lord , be ascribed glory , majesty , might , and authority , as it was before time began , is now , and ever shall be to all the ages . Amen .
66001001	THE UNVEILING APOCALYPSE OF JESUS CHRIST which God gave him to show to his slaves the things which must soon come to pass ; and he sent and made it known by his angel to his slave John .
66001002	He bore witness of the Word of God , and of the testimony of Jesus Christ , even of all the things that he saw .
66001003	Blessed is he who reads , and they who hear the words of the prophecy , and keep what is written in it . FOR THE CRISIS IS AT HAND .
66001004	From John to the seven churches that are in Asia the Roman Province . Grace to you , and peace from Him that is and was and is to be , and from the Seven Spirits that are before his throne ,
66001005	and from Jesus Christ , the faithful witness , the firstborn of the dead , and the Ruler of the kings of the earth . To Him who loves us and has loosed us from our sins in his own blood ;
66001006	and has made us to be a kingdom of priests unto his God and Father ; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever , Amen .
66001007	Behold , he is about to come among the clouds ; and every eye will see him , and all the tribes of the earth will mourn over him . So shall it be , Amen .
66001008	" I am the Alpha and the Omega , " says the Lord God , who is , and who was , and who is to come , the Almighty .
66001009	I , John , who am your brother and who share with you in the woes and kingdom and stedfastness of Jesus , found myself in the island called Patmos , for the sake of the word of God and the testimony of Jesus .
66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lords day , and I heard a loud voice behind me , like a trumpet ,
66001011	saying , " Write in a book what you see , and send it to the seven churches ; to Ephesus and to Smyrna and to Pergamum and to Thyatira and Sardis and Philadelphia and Laodicea . "
66001012	And I turned to see the Voice which was speaking to me , and as I turned I saw seven golden candlesticks ;
66001013	and in the midst of the candlesticks One like to a son of man , clothed with a robe down to the feet , and with a golden girdle round his breast .
66001014	His head and his hair were as white as wool , as white as snow ; his eyes were like a flame of fire ,
66001015	and his feet like burnished brass , as if molten in a furnace ; and his voice like the voice of many waters .
66001016	In his right hand he held seven stars ; and out of mouth went a sharp , two-edged sword , and his face was as the sun shining in his strength .
66001017	When I saw him , I fell at his feet as one dead . And he laid his right hand upon me , saying . " Fear not ; I am the first and the last , and the Living One .
66001018	I was dead , and behold , I am alive forevermore ; and hold the keys of death and of Hades .
66001019	So write the things which you saw , and the things which are , and the things that will come to pass hereafter .
66001020	The mystery of the seven stars which you saw in my right hand , and the seven golden candlesticks , is this . The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches , and the seven candlesticks are the seven churches . "
66002001	To the angel of the Church in Ephesus , write . These are the words of Him who holds the seven stars in his right hand , and who walks among the seven golden candlesticks .
66002002	I know your works and your toil and stedfastness , and that you cannot endure evil men , and that you tested those who called themselves apostles , though they are not , and how you found them false .
66002003	You are holding fast , and have borne up for my namess sake , and have not grown weary .
66002004	But I have this against you , that you have left your first love .
66002005	Remember whence you have fallen , and turn again , and do your first works . Otherwise I am coming to you and will remove your candlestick out of its place , unless you repent .
66002006	But this you have , that you hate the works of the Nicolaitans , which I hate .
66002007	He who has an ear , let him listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches . To him that overcomes , to him will I give to eat from the tree of life which is in the garden of God .
66002008	And unto the angel of the Church in Smyrna , write . These are the words of the First and the Last , he who died and has returned to life .
66002009	I know your persecution and your poverty - but you are rich ! I know the reviling of those who say that they themselves are Jews , when they are not , but are a synagogue of Satan .
66002010	Fear not what you are about to suffer ! Behold , the devil is indeed going to put some of you in prison , that you may be tested , and you will have persecution for ten days . Be faithful even unto death , and I will give you the crown of life .
66002011	Let him who has ears , listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches . He that overcomes shall not be hurt of the second death .
66002012	And to the angel of the Church in Pergamum , write These are the words of Him who holds the sharp two-edged sword .
66002013	I know where you dwell , where the throne of Satan is ; and yet you are holding fast my name , and you have not denied my faith , even in the days of Antipas , my witness , my faithful one , who was slain among you , where Satan has his dwelling .
66002014	But I have a few things against you , because you have there some who hold to the teaching of Balaam , who taught Balak to put a stumbling-block before the sons of Israel , to eat food offered to idols , and to practise immorality .
66002015	So you have also some who hold the teaching of the Nicolaitans .
66002016	Repent ; if you do not I will very soon come to you , and will make war upon them with the sword of my mouth .
66002017	He who has ears , let him listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches . To him that overcomes I will give of the hidden manna , and I will give him a white stone , and upon the stone a new name written , which no man knows , but he that receives it .
66002018	And to the angel of the Church in Thyatira , write . These are the words of the Son of God , who has his eyes like a flame of fire , and his feet like burnished brass .
66002019	I know your works and your love and faith and service and endurance ; I know that your last works are more than the first .
66002020	But I have this against you , that you are tolerating that woman Jezebel , who calls herself a prophetess , and she is teaching and leading my slaves astray , leading them to practise immorality , and to eat food which has been sacrificed to idols .
66002021	I have given her time for repentance ; but she is determined not to turn from her immorality .
66002022	Behold , I will lay her on a sick bed , and bring great distress upon those who have committed adultery with her , unless they turn away from her works .
66002023	And moreover , her children will I kill with pestilence . And all the churches shall know that I am he who searches the hearts and souls of men . I will give to each of you according to his works .
66002024	But to the rest of you in Thyatira , those who do not hold his teaching , and who do not know the " deep things " of Satan ( as they call them ) ,
66002025	I say that I am imposing upon you no fresh burden ; only hold fast what you have till I come .
66002026	To him that overcomes and perseveres in my works to the end , will I give authority over the nations .
66002027	And he shall shepherd them with a rod of iron , shattering them like earthen vessels ( as I myself have received from my Father ) ,
66002028	and I will give him the Morning Star . "
66002029	Let him who has an ear , listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches .
66003001	To the angel of the Church at Sardis , write . These things says He who has the seven Spirits of God and the seven stars . I know your works , that you have the name of being alive , but are really dead .
66003002	Be continually on the watch , and establish the things that remain , which were ready to die . For I have not found your works perfected before my God .
66003003	Call to mind , then , what you have received and heard , and hold to it , and repent . Unless you are on the watch , I will come as a thief , and you will never know at what hour I am coming upon you .
66003004	Yet you have a few names in Sardis that have not defiled their garment ; and they shall walk with me in white , for they are worthy .
66003005	He who overcomes shall thus be clad in white raiment ; and I will in no wise blot out his name from the book of life , and I will own his name before my Father , and before his angels .
66003006	Let him who has an ear , listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches .
66003007	Write also to the angel of the Church in Philadelphia . These things says He who is holy , he who is true , he who has the key of David , he who opens , and no one shall shut ; and who shuts , and no one opens .
66003008	I know your works . Lo , I have set before you an open door , which none can shut ; for though you have only a little strength , you have kept my word , and have not denied my name .
66003009	Behold , I am making those of the synagogue of Satan , those who say they are Jews , but are not , but are lying ; behold , I will make them to come and bow in reverence before your feet , and to know that I have loved you .
66003010	Because you have kept the word of my patience , I also will keep you from that hour of trial which is about to come upon the whole inhabited earth , to test those who dwell on the earth .
66003011	I am coming quickly . Hold fast what you have , that no one may take your crown .
66003012	He that overcomes , I will make him a pillar in the temple of my God ; and he shall go out from it nevermore . And I will write upon him the name of my God , and the name of the city of my God , the new Jerusalem , which is coming down from my God out of heaven , and my own new name .
66003013	He that has an ear , let him listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches .
66003014	To the angel of the Church in Laodicea , write . These things says the Amen , the witness , faithful and true , the beginning of the creation of God .
66003015	I know your works , that you are neither hot nor cold .
66003016	Would that you were either cold or hot . So because you are lukewarm , and neither hot nor cold , I am about to spew you out of my mouth .
66003017	For you keep saying , " I am rich , and have become wealthy , and have need of nothing , " and do not know that you are the wretched one , and pitiable and beggared and blind and naked .
66003018	I advise you to buy of me gold refined by fire , that you may become rich ; and white raiment to clothe yourself , so that the shame of your nakedness may not be made manifest ; and eye-salve to anoint your eyes , in order that you may see .
66003019	All whom I love I reprove and discipline ; therefore be full of zeal and repent .
66003020	Behold , I am standing at the door and knocking ! If any one listens to my voice , and opens the door , I will come to him , and sup with him , and he with me .
66003021	To him who overcomes , I will grant to sit down with me on my throne , as I myself have overcome and have taken my seat with my Father on his throne .
66003022	Let any one who has an ear listen to what the Spirit is saying to the churches .
66004001	After this , in my vision , I saw a door opened in heaven ! And the first voice that I heard speaking with me was like a trumpet , saying , " Come up hither , and I will show you the things that must come to pass hereafter . "
66004002	Immediately I was in the Spirit ; and behold , there stood a throne in heaven , and upon the throne One sat ;
66004003	and he who sat was in appearance like a jasper stone and a sardius ; and there was a rainbow round about the throne , like an emerald to look upon .
66004004	And round about the throne were four and twenty Elders seated , who were clothed in white raiment , with golden crowns upon their heads .
66004005	From the throne issued lightning and voices and thunders . Seven blazing lamps were burning before the throne ; these are the seven Spirits of God .
66004006	And in front of the throne as it seemed , a glassy sea like crystal ; and in the midst of the throne and encircling it are four Living Creatures , full of eyes before and behind .
66004007	The first creature was like a lion , and the second like a calf , and the third creature had a face like a mans , and the fourth creature was like an eagle flying .
66004008	And the four Living Creatures , each one with six wings , are full of eyes round about and within ; day and night they are chanting ceaselessly . " Holy , holy , holy is the Lord God , the Almighty . Who was , and who is , and who is to come . "
66004009	And whenever the Living Creatures give glory and honor and thanks to Him who sits on the throne , to Him who lives forever and ever ,
66004010	the four and twenty Elders fall down before Him who sits on the throne , and worship Him who lives forever and ever , and cast their crowns before the throne , saying .
66004011	" Worthy art thou , our Lord and our God , To receive the glory and the honor and the power ; For thou didst create all things , And because of thy will they came into being And were created . "
66005001	Then I saw lying upon the right hand of Him who sat upon the throne , a book written within and on the back , close sealed with seven seals .
66005002	And I saw a strong angel proclaiming with a loud voice , " Who is worthy to open the book , and to loose its seals . "
66005003	And no one in the heavens or on the earth , or under the earth , was able to open the book , or to look into it .
66005004	so I began to weep bitterly because no one was found worthy to open the book , or to look into it .
66005005	But one of the Elders said to me . " Do not weep ! Behold , the Lion of the tribe of Judah , the Root of David , has conquered , and so can open the book with its seven seals . "
66005006	Then I beheld a Lamb standing as if slain in the midst of the throne and of the four Living Creatures , and in the midst of the Elders . He had seven horns and seven eyes ( which are the seven Spirits of God , sent forth into all the earth ) .
66005007	And he went , and now he has taken the book out of the right hand of Him who was seated on the throne .
66005008	When he took the book , the four Living Creatures and the four and twenty Elders fell down before the Lamb . And each had a harp and a golden bowls full of incense , which are the prayers of the saints .
66005009	And they sang a new song , saying , " Worthy art thou to take the book And to open its seals ; For thou wast slain and didst ransom for God Men out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation ;
66005010	Thou hast made them kings and priests unto our God , And they shall reign on earth . "
66005011	Then I looked and heard a voice of many angels encircling the throne and a voice of the Living Creatures and of the Elders ; and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand , and thousands of thousands ,
66005012	singing aloud , " Worthy is the Lamb who has been slain , To receive power and riches and wisdom And might and honor and glory and blessing . "
66005013	And I heard every created thing that is in heaven , or on earth , or beneath the earth , or on the sea , and all things that are in them , saying , " To him who sits on the throne , And to the Lamb , Be the blessing and the honor , And the glory and the power , Forever and ever ! "
66005014	And the four Living Creatures kept saying , " Amen ! " And the Elders fell down and worshiped .
66006001	And I saw , when the Lamb opened one of the seven seals , and I heard one of the four Living Creatures say , with a voice like thunder , " Come ! "
66006002	And I saw , and lo , a white horse , and he who sat on him had a bow ; and there was given him a crown ; and he went forth conquering , and to conquer .
66006003	And when he opened the second seal , I heard the second Living Creature say , " Come ! "
66006004	And another horse come forth , a red horse . To him who sat on it , it was allowed to take peace from the earth , and to cause men to kill one another ; and a great sword was given to him .
66006005	And when he opened the third seal , I heard the third Living Creature say , " Come ! " And I saw , and lo , a black horse ! He who sat on him had a balance in his hand .
66006006	And I heard the semblance of a voice in the midst of the four Living Creatures , saying . " A quart of wheat for a shilling , and three quarts of barley for a shilling ; but do not harm the oil and the wine . "
66006007	And when he opened the fourth seal , I heard the voice of the fourth Living Creature calling , " Come ! "
66006008	So I liked , and lo , a pale horse ; and he who sat on him was named Death ; and Hades was following after him . To them was given authority over the fourth part of the earth , to kill with the sword , and with famine , and with death , and with the wild beasts of the earth .
66006009	And when he opened the fifth seal , I saw underneath the altar the souls of those who had been slain for the word of God , and for the testimony which they bore .
66006010	And with a loud voice they cried , saying , " O Master , holy and true , How long dost thou not judge And avenge our blood On those who dwell on the earth ? "
66006011	And there was given to each one of them a white robe ; and they were told that they should rest for yet a little time , until the number should be completed by their fellow slaves and their brethren who were about to be put to death as they had been .
66006012	And I looked when he opened the sixth seal , and there was a great earthquake ; and the sun became black , like sackcloth , and the full moon became like blood ;
66006013	and the stars of the sky fell to earth , as a fig tree shaken by a gale drops its unripe figs .
66006014	And the sky parted asunder like a rolled-up scroll ; and every mountain and island was moved out of its place ;
66006015	and the kings of the earth , and the princes , and the generals , the rich and the mighty , both slaves and freemen , every one of them hid themselves in the caves and among the rocks of the mountains .
66006016	And they began to say to the mountains and to the rocks . " Fall upon us and hide us From the face of him who is seated upon the throne , And from the wrath of the Lamb ;
66006017	For the Great Day of their wrath has come , And who is able to stand ? "
66007001	After this I saw four angels , standing at the four corners of the earth , restraining the four winds from blowing on the earth , or on the sea , or on any tree .
66007002	And I saw another angel ascend from the sunrising , having a seal of the living God ; and he cried with a great voice to the four angels to whom it was given to injure the earth and the sea ,
66007003	saying , " Do no harm to the earth , or the sea , or the trees , Until we have sealed the slaves of our God on their foreheads . "
66007004	And I heard the number of those who were sealed , a hundred and forty and four thousand , sealed out of every tribe of the children of Israel .
66007005	Of the tribe of Judah , twelve thousand were sealed ; Of the tribe of Reuben , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Gad , twelve thousand ;
66007006	Of the tribe of Asher , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Naphtali , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Manasseh , twelve thousand ;
66007007	Of the tribe of Symeon , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Levi , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Issachar , twelve thousand ;
66007008	Of the tribe of Zebulun , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Joseph , twelve thousand ; Of the tribe of Benjamin , twelve thousand ;
66007009	After this I looked , and behold a great multitude , whom no man could number , out of every nation and tribe and people and tongue , standing before the throne and before the Lamb , clothed in white robes , with palm branches in their hands ;
66007010	and they cried with a loud voice , saying " Salvation to our God , who sits on the throne , And to the Lamb ! "
66007011	And all the angels stood encircling the throne , and the Elders and the Living Creatures ; and they fell on their faces before the throne , worshiping God ,
66007012	and crying , " Even so ! The blessing and the glory and the wisdom And the thanksgiving and the honor and the power and the might Be to our God forever and ever . Amen . "
66007013	And one of the Elders spoke to me , saying . " Who are these , clad in white robes ? Whence come they ? "
66007014	And I said to him , " You know , my Lord . " And he said to me , " These are those who have come out of the great persecution , and have washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb .
66007015	For this they are now before the throne of God , and are serving him day and night in his temple . " And He who sits on the throne Will spread his tabernacle over them .
66007016	They hunger no more , Neither thirst any more ; Neither will the sun strike upon them , Nor any scorching heat ;
66007017	For the Lamb in the midst of the throne Will shepherd them , And will lead them to fountains of living water ; And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes . "
66008001	And when he opened the seventh seal , there followed a silence in heaven , about the space of half an hour .
66008002	And I saw the seven angels who stand before God , and seven trumpets were given them .
66008003	And another angel came and stood at the altar , having a golden censer , and a great quantity of incense was given him to mingle with the prayers of all the saints upon the golden altar , which was before the throne .
66008004	And the smoke of the incense , with the prayers of the saints , rose up from the hand of the angel into the presence of God .
66008005	Then the angel took the censer , and he filled it with fire from the altar , and poured it upon the earth ; and there followed thunders and voices and lightnings and an earthquake .
66008006	And the seven angels with the seven trumpets prepared to blow their trumpets .
66008007	And the first angel blew his trumpet , and there followed hail and fire mingled with blood , and it fell upon the earth ; and the third part of the earth was burned up , and the third part of the trees , and all the green grass .
66008008	And the second angel blew his trumpet , and something like a great mountain burning with fire was hurled into the sea ; and a third part of the sea became blood ;
66008009	and a third part of the living creatures in the sea died , and the third part of the ships were destroyed .
66008010	And the third angel blew his trumpet , and there fell from heaven a great star , blazing like a torch . It fell upon a third of the rivers and upon the springs . ( The name of the star is called Wormwood . )
66008011	A third part of the waters became wormwood ; and many men died of the waters , because they were made bitter .
66008012	And the fourth angel blew his trumpet , and the third part of the sun was blasted , and a third part of the moon , and a third part of the stars ; so that the third part of them should be darkened , and for a third part of the day there was no light , and at night it was the same .
66008013	And I looked and I heard a solitary eagle flying in mid-heaven , and crying with a loud voice , " Woe , woe , woe for all who live on the earth , Because of the rest of the trumpet-blasts That the three angels are about to blow ! "
66009001	Then the fifth angel blew his trumpet , and I saw a star fallen from heaven upon the earth ; and to him was given the key to the bottomless pit .
66009002	And he opened the bottomless pit , and out of the pit there went up a smoke like the smoke of a great furnace . And the sun and the air grew dark , because of the smoke out of the pit .
66009003	And out of the smoke came locusts upon the earth ; they were given power like that of scorpions on the earth . .
66009004	They were told not to hurt the grass of the earth , nor any plant , nor any tree , but only those who have not the seal of God on their foreheads .
66009005	Yet they were not permitted to kill them , but only to torture them for five months . Their torture was like the torture of a scorpion , when it stings a man .
66009006	In those days men will seek death , and will not find it ; they will long to die , but death ever flees from them .
66009007	The appearance of the locusts was like horses equipped for battle . On their heads there was something like crowns of gold , and their faces were like mens faces ,
66009008	and they had hair like the hair of women , and their teeth were like lions teeth ,
66009009	and they had breastplates something like breastplates of iron ; and the noise of their wings was like the noise of chariots , of many horses rushing into battle .
66009010	And they have tails like scorpions , and stings , and their power to torture men five months was in their tails .
66009011	They have a king over them , the angel of the bottomless pit . His name in Hebrew is Abaddon ; in Greek he is called Apollyon .
66009012	" The first woe has passed ; and still there are two woes to follow . "
66009013	Then the sixth angel blew his trumpet ; and I heard a voice from the horns of the golden altar which is before God ,
66009014	one saying to the sixth angel that had the trumpet , " Loose the four angels which are bound at the great river Euphrates . "
66009015	Then the four angels that were held in readiness for that hour and day and month and year , were let loose , to destroy a third of mankind .
66009016	The number of the hosts of the horsemen was twice ten thousand times ten thousand . I heard their number ;
66009017	and thus I saw the horses in the vision and their riders . They had breastplates of fire , " red as fire , dark blue as jacinth , and yellow as sulphur . " The heads of the horses were like lions heads , and out of their mouths issued fire and smoke and brimstone .
66009018	By these three plagues a third of mankind were killed ; by the fire and the smoke and the brimstone which issued from their mouths .
66009019	For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails . For their tails are like serpents with heads , and with them they work woe .
66009020	And the rest of mankind who were not killed with these plagues , did not repent of the works of their hands . They would not give up the worship of demons and of idols made of gold and silver , and brass , and stone , and wood , which can neither see , nor hear , nor walk .
66009021	And they did not repent of their murders , nor of their sorceries , nor of their immorality , nor of their thefts .
66010001	And I saw another mighty angel coming down out of heaven , clad with a cloud ; and a rainbow was upon his head , and his face was like the sun , and his feet like pillars of fire .
66010002	In his hand he had a little book , open ; and he set his right foot upon the sea , and his left upon the land .
66010003	With a great voice he shouted as a lion roars ; and when he shouted , the seven thunders uttered their voices .
66010004	When the seven thunders uttered their voices , I was about to write ; but I heard a voice from the sky , saying , " Seal up the words which the seven thunders uttered , and write them not . "
66010005	And the angel whom I had seen standing upon the sea and upon the land lifted up his right hand to heaven ,
66010006	and swore by him who lives forever and ever , who created the heaven and all that is in it , and the earth and all that is in it , and the sea and all that is in it ,
66010007	" Delay there shall be no more , but in the days of the voice of the seventh angel , when he is about to blow his trumpet , then shall there be finished the mystery of God , according to the Good News which he told unto his slaves , the prophets . "
66010008	And the voice which I had heard from heaven , I heard again , speaking to me , and saying , " Go , take the little book that is open in the hand of the angel who stands upon the sea and upon the land . "
66010009	And I went to the angel and told him to give me the little book . And he said to me . " Take it , and eat it up ; it will make your belly bitter , but in your mouth it will be as sweet as honey . "
66010010	I took the little book out of the hand of the angel , and ate it up , and it was in my mouth sweet like honey ; but when I had eaten it , my belly was made bitter .
66010011	Then I was told , " You must prophesy again over many peoples and nations and tongues and kings . "
66011001	And there was given me a reed like to a rod , and a voice said to me . " Go and measure the temple of God , and the altar , and those who are worshiping therein .
66011002	But the court which is outside the temple , omit , and do not measure that , for it has been given up to the Gentiles , and they shall tread under foot the Holy City for forty and two months .
66011003	And I will give power to my two witnesses , and clothed in sackcloth they shall prophesy a thousand two hundred and threescore days .
66011004	" These are the two olive trees , and the two candlesticks standing before the God of the earth .
66011005	When any one wishes to hurt them , fire comes from their mouth and devours their enemies ; and if any man wishes to hurt them , in this manner he must be killed .
66011006	These have power to shut heaven so that it does not rain in the days of their prophecy ; and have power over waters to turn them to blood , and to smite the earth with all plagues , as often as they will .
66011007	" And when they shall have finished their testimony , the beast that is coming up out of the bottomless pit will make war with them , and overcome them , and kill them .
66011008	And their dead bodies lie in the streets of the great city whose mystical name is Sodom and Egypt - where also their Lord was crucified .
66011009	For three days and a half men of all peoples , and tribes , and languages , and nations , look upon their dead bodies , and refuse to let their dead bodies be laid in a tomb .
66011010	" And those who dwell on the earth are rejoicing over them , and making merry ; and they will send gifts to one another ; because these two prophets were a torment to those who dwell on the earth .
66011011	And after three days and a half the breath of life from God entered into them , and they stood on their feet , and great fear fell upon them .
66011012	And they heard a great voice from heaven saying unto them , " Come up hither , " and they went up to heaven on a cloud , while their enemies watched them .
66011013	And in that hour there was a great earthquake , and the tenth part of the city fell ; and there were killed in the earthquake seven thousand persons ; and the rest were frightened and gave glory to the God of heaven .
66011014	" The second woe is passed ; and there is a third woe soon to follow . "
66011015	And the seventh angel blew his trumpet ; and there followed great voices in heaven , and they said , " THE KINGDOMS OF THIS WORLD ARE BECOME THE KINGDOM OF OUR LORD AND OF HIS CHRIST , AND HE WILL REIGN FOREVER AND EVER . "
66011016	Then the four and twenty Elders who are seated before God on their thrones , fell upon their faces and worshiped God ,
66011017	saying . " We give thee thanks , O Lord God , The Almighty , who art and who wast ; For thou hast taken thy great power , And begun to reign .
66011018	The nations raged , and thy wrath came , And the time for the dead to be judged ; The time for rewarding thy slaves , the prophets And the saints , and those who reverence thy name , Both small and great ; And the time to destroy those who are destroying the earth . "
66011019	Then the temple of God in heaven was opened , and the ark of his covenant was seen inside his sanctuary ; and there followed lightnings and voices and thunders , and an earthquake , and great hail .
66012001	And a great sign was seen in heaven ; a woman clothed with the sun , and the moon under her feet , and upon her head a diadem of twelve stars .
66012002	She was with child ; and she cried out , travailing in birth , in anguish to be delivered .
66012003	And another sign was seen in heaven ; and lo , a great red dragon , with seven heads and ten horns , and upon his head seven diadems .
66012004	His tail drew a third part of the stars of the sky , and dashed them down to the earth . And the dragon stood before the woman about to be delivered , so that he might devour her child when she was delivered .
66012005	And she gave birth to a son , a man child , who is to shepherd all the nations with a rod of iron ; and her child was caught up unto God and unto his throne .
66012006	And the woman fled into the desert , where she has a place prepared by God , in which she is to be nourished for a thousand two hundred and threescore days .
66012007	And there was war in heaven . Michael and his angels went forth to war with the dragon ; and the dragon also fought , and his angels ;
66012008	but they failed , nor was their place found any more in heaven .
66012009	Now the great dragon was thrown down - that old Serpent , he who is called the devil and Satan , the deceiver of the whole world . He was thrown down to the earth , and his angels were thrown down with him .
66012010	And I heard a great voice in heaven , which said . " Now it is come ! the salvation and the power , The kingdom of our God , and the authority of his Christ ! For the accuser of our brethren is thrown down , Who accused them before our God , day and night .
66012011	And they have conquered him by the blood of the Lamb , And by the word of their testimony ; And they loved not their life , even unto death .
66012012	Therefore rejoice , O heavens , And you who dwell therein ! Woe to the earth and the sea ! For the devil has gone down to you in great fury , Because he knows that he has but little time . "
66012013	When the dragon saw that he was hurled down to the earth , he pursued the woman who gave birth to the man child .
66012014	But the woman was given the two wings of the great eagle , so that she might fly into the desert to her place where she is nourished for a time , and times , and half a time , from the face of the serpent .
66012015	And the serpent poured water from his mouth after the woman , water like a river , so that he might cause her to be carried off by the stream .
66012016	But the earth came to the rescue of the woman and the earth opened her mouth and swallowed up the river that the dragon had poured forth from his mouth .
66012017	And the dragon was enraged at the woman , and went away to make war upon the rest of her children who keep the commandments of God , and hold fast the testimony of Jesus . And he stood upon the sand of the sea .
66013001	Then I saw rising up out of the sea a beast who had ten horns and seven heads . On his horns he had ten diadems , and on his heads blasphemous titles .
66013002	The beast I saw was like a leopard , and his feet were bears feet , and his mouth a lions mouth . The dragon gave him his power and his throne and great authority .
66013003	And I saw that one of his heads seemed to have been mortally wounded , but its deadly wound had been healed . The whole earth was following the beast , wondering .
66013004	Men worshiped the dragon because he gave his authority to the beast ; and they worshiped the beast , saying . " Who is like the beast ? Who can fight with him ? "
66013005	And he was permitted to utter loud boasts and blasphemies ; and there was given to him authority to continue forty-two months .
66013006	So he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God , to blaspheme his name and his tabernacle ( those who live in his tabernacle in heaven ) .
66013007	The beast was allowed to wage war upon the saints , and to conquer them ; and there was given him authority over every tribe and people and tongue and nation ;
66013008	and each one whose name has not been written in the Lambs book of life , the Lamb who has been slain from the foundation of the world . All who dwell on the earth shall worship him .
66013009	Let him who has ears to hear , listen .
66013010	Whoever is destined to go into captivity , goes into captivity . Whoever shall kill with the sword , shall surely be killed by the sword . ( Here is the endurance and faith of the saints . )
66013011	And I saw another beast ascending from the land ; and he had two horns like a lamb , but he spoke like a dragon ;
66013012	and he exerts the full authority of the first beast before him , and he makes the earth and its inhabitants worship the first beast whose death-stroke was healed .
66013013	And he performs great miracles , so that he even causes fire to come down to the earth from the sky , before mens eyes .
66013014	And he deceives those who dwell on the earth , because of the miracles , which he is permitted to perform in the sight of the beast . He tells those who live on the earth to make an image to the beast who had the sword-stroke , yet lived .
66013015	And he was permitted to give breath to the image of the beast , so that the image of the beast should speak ; and so that any one who would not worship the image of the beast should be put to death .
66013016	And he makes all men , low and high , rich and poor , freemen and slaves , to have a brand put upon their right hands or upon their brows ,
66013017	so that no one can buy or sell unless he has the brand of the beast , or the number of his name .
66013018	Here is wisdom . Let him who has understanding count the number of the beast ; for it is the number of a man ; and his number is 666 .
66014001	And I looked , and lo , there was the Lamb standing on Mount Zion , and with were a hundred and forty and four thousand who had his name and his Fathers name written on their foreheads .
66014002	And I heard a voice from heaven like the voice of many waters , and the voice of a great thunder ; and I heard the voice of harpers harping on their harps .
66014003	They were singing a new song before the throne , and before the four Living Creatures and the Elders ; and none can learn that song , except the one hundred and forty and four thousand , who had been redeemed from the earth .
66014004	These are they who were not defiled with women ; for they are celibates . They follow the Lamb wherever he goes . They have been redeemed from among men to be the first-fruits unto God and the Lamb .
66014005	No lie was ever found on their lips ; they are spotless .
66014006	Then I saw another angel who was flying in mid-heaven . He had an eternal evangel , to evangelize all the dwellers on the earth , of every nation and tribe and tongue and people .
66014007	And he cried with a loud voice . " Fear God and give him glory , Because the hour of his judgment is come . And worship Him who made the heavens and the earth And the sea and springs of waters . "
66014008	Then a second angel followed , crying , " Fallen , fallen is Babylon the Great , Who has made all the nations drink the wine Of the frenzy of her fornication . "
66014009	And another angel , a third , followed them , crying with a mighty voice . " Whoever worships the beast and his image , And receives a brand on his forehead or on his hand ,
66014010	He also shall drink of the wine of the wrath of God , Poured out unmixed in the cup of his anger ; And he shall be tormented with fire and brimstone In the presence of the holy angels , And in the presence of the Lamb ,
66014011	And the smoke of their torment ascends forever and ever ; And they have no rest day or night , Who worship the beast and his image , And all who receive the brand of his name . "
66014012	Here is the endurance of the saints , those who keep the commandments of God , and the faith of Jesus .
66014013	And I heard a voice from heaven , saying , " Write , Blessed are the dead that die in the Lord from henceforth ! Yea , says the Spirit , that they may rest from their labors , For their deeds do follow them . "
66014014	And I looked , and lo , a white cloud ; and on the cloud I saw One sitting like to a son of man , with a golden crown on his head , and a sharp sickle in his hand .
66014015	And another angel came out of the temple , shouting with a loud voice to him who sat on the cloud . " Thrust in your sickle , and reap ; for the time to reap is come . The harvest of the earth is overripe . "
66014016	And he who sat on the cloud thrust in his sickle upon the earth ; and the earth was reaped .
66014017	And another angel came out of the temple which is in heaven , and he , too , had a sharp sickle .
66014018	And another angel came from the altar , the angel who has power over fire , and he called with a loud voice to the one who had the sharp sickle , saying , " Thrust in your sharp sickle , And gather the clusters of the vine of the earth , For its grapes are fully ripe . "
66014019	So the angel thrust his sickle into the earth and gathered the clusters of the vine of the earth , and threw them into the winepress , the great winepress of the wrath of God .
