66014020	And the winepress was trodden outside the city , and blood gushed out of the winepress , even to the bridles of the horses , as far as two hundred miles .
66015001	And I beheld another sign in heaven , great and marvelous , seven angels with the seven last plagues ; because with them the wrath of God is finished .
66015002	And I saw the semblance of a glassy sea , mingled with fire ; and standing by this glassy sea , with harps of God , were those who came off conquerors from the beast and from his image and from the cipher of his name .
66015003	They were singing the song of Moses , the slave of God , and the song of the Lamb , saying . " Great and marvelous are thy works , O Lord God , the Almighty ! Righteous and true are thy ways , Thou King of kings !
66015004	Who shall not fear , O Lord , And glorify thy name ? For thou only art holy . For all the nations shall come and worship before thee ; For thy righteous acts have been made evident . "
66015005	After that I looked , and the sanctuary of the tabernacle of testimony was opened in heaven ;
66015006	and there came out of the sanctuary the seven angels with the seven plagues . They were clothed in white linen , pure and bright , and girt about the breasts with golden girdles .
66015007	And one of the four Living Creatures gave to the seven angels seven golden bowls , full of the wrath of God , who lives forever and ever .
66015008	The sanctuary was filled with smoke from the glory and majesty of God ; and no one could enter the sanctuary until the seven plagues of the seven angels were finished .
66016001	Then I heard a loud voice which came out of the temple , saying to the seven angels , " Go , empty the seven bowls of the wrath of God upon the earth . "
66016002	The first angel went and poured out his bowl upon the earth . And it was turned to loathsome and painful sores upon all who bore the brand of the beast , and who worshiped his image .
66016003	And the second angel poured out his bowl upon the sea ; and it became blood , like the blood of a corpse , and every living creature died - everything in the sea .
66016004	And the third poured out his bowl into the rivers and springs of waters ; and they were turned into blood .
66016005	And I heard the angel of the waters saying . " Righteous art thou , thou who art and wast , The Holy One , Because thou didst inflict this judgment .
66016006	For men poured out the blood of thy saints and prophets , And thou hast given them blood to drink . And this they deserved . "
66016007	And I heard the altar saying , " Yea , O Lord , the Almighty , True and righteous are thy judgments . "
66016008	And the fourth angel poured out his bowl upon the sun , and the sun was permitted to scorch men with fire .
66016009	And men were scorched with the terrible heat ; and they blasphemed the name of the God who had the power over these plagues ; yet they repented not , to give him glory .
66016010	And the fifth poured out his bowl upon the throne of the beast ; and his kingdom became darkened , and men gnawed their tongues for pain ,
66016011	and they blasphemed the God of heaven , because of their pains and their sores ; yet of their deeds they did not repent .
66016012	And the sixth poured his bowl upon the great river , the River Euphrates , and its water was dried up so as to make ready the way for the kings that come from the sunrising .
66016013	And I saw three unclean spirits , like frogs , coming out of the dragons mouth , and the beasts mouth , and the false prophets mouth .
66016014	For these are the spirits of demons performing miracles , who go forth to the kings of the habitable earth , to gather them together for the battle of the great Day of God , the Almighty .
66016015	Lo , I am coming like a thief . Blessed is the who is on the watch and guarding his clothing , so that he may not walk naked , and they gaze on his shame .
66016016	And the spirits gathered the kings together at the place called in Hebrew , Armageddon .
66016017	And the seventh poured out his bowl upon the air , and a great voice came forth out of the temple from the throne , saying , " It is finished ! "
66016018	And lightnings and voices and thunders and a great earthquake such as had not happened since man began to be upon the earth , so great an earthquake , so mighty ;
66016019	and the great city was shattered into three parts , and the cities of the nations fell , and great Babylon came to mind before the face of God , to give her the cup of the wine of the passion of his anger .
66016020	And every island fled away , and the mountains sank from sight .
66016021	And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven , every stone about the weight of a talent ; and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail , for the plague of it is very great .
66017001	And there came one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls , and spoke to me , saying , " Come hither and I will show you the sentence passed upon the great harlot who sits on many waters ,
66017002	with whom the kings of the earth have committed adultery , while all who live on the earth have been made drunken by the wine of her immorality . "
66017003	And he bore me away in the Spirit into the desert , and I saw a woman who sat upon a scarlet beast covered with blasphemous names . It had seven heads and ten horns .
66017004	The woman was enwrapped in purple and scarlet and was encrusted with gold and precious stones and pearls . In her hand she held a golden cup filled with abominations , even the impurities of her immorality .
66017005	Upon her forehead a name was written , a mystery , " BABYLON THE GREAT , THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS , AND ABOMINABLE THINGS OF THE EARTH . "
66017006	And I saw the woman drunk with the blood of the saints , and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus , and I wondered with a great wonder .
66017007	And the angel said to me . " Why did you wonder ? I will explain to you the mystery of the woman , and of the beast with the seven heads and ten horns , that carried her .
66017008	The beast that you saw was , and is not , and is about to come up out of the bottomless pit , and to go into perdition . And those who dwell on the earth shall wonder , those whose names have never , from the foundation of the world , been written in the Lambs Book of Life , when they gaze on the beast ; how he was and is not , and is to come .
66017009	Here is the mind that has wisdom . the seven heads are seven hills on which the woman is seated ;
66017010	and they are seven kings ; the five have fallen , one is , the other is not yet come ( and when he does come , he must remain a short time ) .
66017011	And the beast who was , but is not , is himself also an eighth , although he is one of the seven kings , and is on his way to perdition .
66017012	" The ten horns that you saw are ten kings who have not yet received their kingdoms ; but they have received authority as kings for one hour , together with the beast .
66017013	These kings have one mind , and they give their power and authority to the beast .
66017014	These will make war against the Lamb , and the Lamb will conquer them , for he is the Lord of lords , and King of kings . And they who are with him are called and faithful and chosen . "
66017015	And he also said to me . " The waters which you saw , on which the harlot takes her seat , are peoples and multitudes and nations and tongues .
66017016	And the ten horns which you saw , they and the beast will hate the harlot and make her desolate and naked , and will eat her flesh and burn her up with fire .
66017017	For God has put it into their hearts to execute his purpose , in executing their common purpose , and by giving over their kingdoms to the beast , until the words of God shall be accomplished .
66017018	The woman whom you saw is the great city which holds sway over the kings of the earth . "
66018001	After this I saw another angel coming down from heaven , who had great authority ; and the earth was illumined by his glory .
66018002	He shouted with a mighty cry , saying . " She is fallen ! She is fallen , Babylon the great ! Now she is a dwelling-place of demons , A stronghold of every foul spirit , A stronghold of every foul and hateful bird .
66018003	For all nations , having drunk the wine of the frenzy of her fornication , are fallen ; And the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her , And the merchants of the earth have grown rich by the power of her wantonness . "
66018004	And behold I heard another voice from heaven saying . " Come out of her , that you have no fellowship with her sins , And that you receive not her plagues .
66018005	For her sins have been heaped to heaven , And God has remembered her iniquities .
66018006	Render to her what she rendered ; Yes , pay double what her deeds deserve . In the cup she mixed , mix double for her .
66018007	By so much as she glorified herself and waxed wanton , By so much give her of torture and tears , For she says in her heart , I sit here a queen , I am no widow . I shall in no wise see mourning .
66018008	Therefore in one day shall these plagues come upon her , Death and mourning and famine , And she shall be burnt with fire ; For mighty is the Lord God , her judge .
66018009	And the kings of the earth who committed fornication And lived wantonly with her , Will weep and wail over her , When they behold the smoke of her burning ,
66018010	Standing afar off for the fear of her torment , saying , Woe , woe , the great city Babylon , the strong city ! In one hour is your judgment come !
66018011	" And the merchants of the earth weep and mourn over her , For no one buys their merchandise any more -
66018012	Merchandise of gold and silver and precious stones , Of pearls , and fine linen , and purple and silk and scarlet ; All citron wood , and vessels of ivory , And vessels of rare wood and brass and iron and marble ;
66018013	Cinnamon and balsam and spices and myrrh and frankincense ; Wine and oil and fine flour and wheat ; Cattle and sheep , and horses and chariots , And slaves , and the souls of men .
66018014	And the fruits which your soul lusted for are gone from you , And all things that were dainty and sumptuous are perished from you , And men shall find them nevermore .
66018015	" The traders in those things , who were enriched by her , shall stand afar off for fear of her torment , weeping and mourning ,
66018016	saying . " Woe , woe , the great city ! She who was clothed in fine linen and purple and scarlet , And adorned with gold and precious stones and pearls !
66018017	In one hour so great riches is made desolate ! " And every shipmaster and every one who sails to any port , And sailors , and all seafaring folk ,
66018018	Stood at a distance , and as they saw the smoke from the burning city , cried , " What city can compare with the great city ?
66018019	And they threw dust on their heads , and cried out , Weeping and mourning , saying , " Woe , woe , the great city , In which all who have ships on the sea Grew rich through her luxury ! For in one hour she is made desolate ! "
66018020	Rejoice over her , O Heaven ! Rejoice , ye saints , apostles , prophets ! For God has now avenged you .
66018021	Then a mighty angel lifted a boulder like a great millstone , and hurled it into the sea , saying , " So shall Babylon , the great city , be overthrown with a mighty fall , And shall be found no more at all .
66018022	No more shall the voice of harpers and minstrels , flute-players and trumpeters Be heard in you . No more shall any craftsman of any craft Be found at all in you . No more shall the sound of a millstone be heard at all in you .
66018023	No light of a lamp shall ever shine in you again ; And in you shall the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride be heard no more . For your merchants were the princes of the earth ; And with your sorcery were all the nations deceived ;
66018024	And in you was found the blood of prophets and of saints , And of all who have been slain upon the earth . "
66019001	After this I heard the semblance of the mighty voice of a great multitude in heaven , crying . " Hallelujah ! Salvation and glory and power Unto the Lord our God !
66019002	For true and righteous are his judgments ; For he has judged the great harlot Who was corrupting the earth with her fornication . On her he has avenged the blood of his slaves . "
66019003	And a second time they said . " Allelulia ! For the smoke of her torment goes up forever and ever ! "
66019004	Then the four and twenty Elders and the four beasts fell down and worshiped God who sits on the throne , saying , " Amen , Hallelujah ! "
66019005	And a voice came forth from the throne , saying , " Praise our God , all you his slaves , All you who fear him , small and great ! "
66019006	And I heard a sound like the voice of a great multitude , and like the voice of many waters , and like the voice of mighty thunderings , saying . " Alleluia , for the Lord God omnipotent reigns !
66019007	Let us rejoice and triumph and give him the glory ; For the marriage of the Lamb is come , And his bride has made herself ready ,
66019008	And it has been granted to her to array herself in fine linen , bright and pure ; For the fine linen is the righteous deeds of the saints . "
66019009	And he said to me , Write , " Blessed are those who have been bidden to the marriage supper of the Lamb . " And he said to me , " These are true words of God . "
66019010	And I fell down at his feet to worship him , and he said to me . " See that you do it not . I am a fellow slave of yours and of your brothers who hold the testimony of Jesus ; for the testimony of Jesus is the vital breath of prophecy . "
66019011	And I saw heaven opened , and lo ! a white horse ; and he who sat upon him was named " Faithful and True " ; and in righteousness does he judge and make war .
66019012	His eyes are a flame of fire , and upon his head are many diadems ; and he has a name written , which none knows but himself .
66019013	He is clothed in a vesture dipped in blood ; and his name is called , THE WORD OF GOD
66019014	And the armies of heaven followed him upon white horses , clothed in fine linen , white and pure .
66019015	And there issues from his lips a sharp sword with which to smite the nations . He shall shepherd them with a rod of iron . And he treads the winepress of the passion of the anger of Almighty God .
66019016	And on his robe and on his thigh he has a name written , KING OF KINGS AND LORD OF LORDS
66019017	And I saw an angel standing in the sun , who shouted in a loud voice to all the birds that fly in mid-heaven , " Come , gather yourselves together to the great supper of God ,
66019018	to eat the flesh of kings , the flesh of generals , the flesh of horses and their riders , and the flesh of all men , bond and free , small and great . "
66019019	And I saw the beast and the kings of the earth and their armies gathered together to make war on him who sat on the horse and on his army .
66019020	And the beast was seized , and with him the false prophet who performed miracles in his presence to deceive those who had received the brand of the beast , and those who worshiped his image . The two were thrown alive into the lake of fire , blazing with brimstone .
66019021	And the rest were slain with the sword of him who sat on the horse , that sword which issued from his lips . And all the birds gorged themselves with their flesh .
66020001	And I saw an angel coming down out of heaven , with the key of the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand .
66020002	He gripped the dragon , that old serpent , who is the devil and Satan , and bound him for a thousand years ,
66020003	and flung him into the bottomless pit , and shut and sealed it over him , so that he should seduce the nations no more , until the thousand years were completed . After that it is necessary to loose him for a little while .
66020004	And I saw thrones , and those who sat on them , and they were permitted to judge ; and I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded for the testimony of Jesus , and for the Word of God , those who did not worship the beast nor his image , and who did not receive his brand upon their brow , or hands . And they lived and reigned with Christ for a thousand years .
66020005	The rest of the dead did not live until the thousand years were completed . This is the first resurrection .
66020006	Blessed and holy is he who has a part in the first resurrection ; on such the second death has no power , but they will be Gods priests , and Christs ; and will reign with him for a thousand years .
66020007	And when the thousand years have been completed , Satan will be loosed out of his prison ,
66020008	and will go forth to seduce the nations which are in the four quarters of the earth , Gog and Magog , to marshal them for war - their number is like the sands of the sea .
66020009	And they went up over the broad earth , and surrounded the encampment of the saints , and the beloved city . Then fire fell from the sky and consumed them ;
66020010	and the devil who had been deceiving them was hurled into the lake of fire and brimstone , where lie also the beast and the false prophet . And they will be tortured day and night , forever and ever .
66020011	And I saw a great white throne , and One who sat thereon ; from his presence fled earth and sky , and no place was found for them .
66020012	And I saw the dead , great and small , standing before the throne ; and books were opened , and another book - the Book of Life - was opened ; and the dead were judged according to their deeds , by what was written in the books .
66020013	The sea gave up the dead who were in it . Death and Hades gave up the dead who were in them .
66020014	And all were judged according to their deeds . And Death and Hades were hurled into the lake of fire . This is the second death , the lake of fire .
66020015	And if any one was found who was not written in the Book of Life , he was hurled into the lake of fire .
66021001	Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth , for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away ; and the sea is no more .
66021002	And I saw the Holy City , the New Jerusalem , descending out of heaven from God , made ready like a bride adorned for her husband .
66021003	And I heard a loud voice out of the throne , crying . " Behold , Gods tent is with men , And he will tent with them , And they will be his peoples . And God himself will be with them ,
66021004	And he will wipe away every tear from their eyes . Death will be no more , Nor will there be mourning , Nor crying , nor pain any more . Because the first things have passed away . "
66021005	And He who sat on the throne said , " Behold , I am making all things new . " And He said to me , " Write this , for these words are trustworthy and genuine . "
66021006	He also said . " It has now come to pass . I am the Alpha and the Omega , The Beginning and the End . To him who thirsts I will freely give Of the spring of the Water of life .
66021007	He who overcomes will inherit these , And I will be his God , And he shall be my son .
66021008	But as for the cowards , the faithless , the abominable , And for the murderers , fornicators , sorcerers , Idolaters , and all liars , Their part will be in the lake that blazes with fire and brimstone . " This is the second death . "
66021009	And there came to me one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls filled with the last plagues , and he spoke to me , saying . " Come hither ! I will show you the bride , the Lambs wife . "
66021010	And he carried me away in the Spirit to a mountain , huge and high ; and he showed me the Holy City , Jerusalem , descending out of heaven from God .
66021011	It had the glory of God . Its light was like some precious stone , like jasper , clear as crystal ;
66021012	with a wall great and high , and twelve gates , and at the gates twelve angels ; and names written thereon , the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel .
66021013	On the east were three gates ; and on the north , three gates ; and on the south , three gates ; and on the west , three gates .
66021014	And the wall of the city had twelve foundations , and on them were the twelve names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb .
66021015	And he who spoke had a golden reed , as a measure , to measure the city and its gates and walls .
66021016	And the city lies foursquare ; the length of it is as great as the breadth . Then he measured the city with the reed , fifteen hundred miles ; the length and the breadth and the height of it are equal .
66021017	And he measured its wall , two hundred and sixteen feet , mans measure , which is an angels .
66021018	And its wall is made of jasper ; but the city is of pure gold , like pure glass .
66021019	The foundations of the wall of the city were adorned with all kings of precious stones . The first foundation-stone was jasper , the second sapphire , the third chalcedony , the fourth emerald ,
66021020	the fifth sardonyx , the sixth sardius , the seventh chrysolite , the eighth beryl , the ninth topaz , the tenth chrysoprase , the eleventh jacinth , the twelfth amethyst .
66021021	And the twelve gates were twelve pearls ; each gate of one pearl . And the broad street of the city was of pure gold , transparent like glass .
66021022	And I saw no temple in the city ; For the temple is the Lord God , the Almighty , And the Lamb .
66021023	And the city has no need of the sun , Nor of the moon , to shine upon it ; For the glory of God has lightened it , And its lamp is the Lamb .
66021024	And the nations will walk by its light . And into it the kings of the earth will bring their glory ;
66021025	And its gates will not be shut by day , ( For there is no night there ) ;
66021026	And they will bring the glory and honor Of the nations into it .
66021027	There will not enter it anything profane , Nor any who work abominations and a lie ; But only those who are written In the Lambs Book of Life .
66022001	And he showed me the river of the Water of Life , clear as crystal , Flowing out from the throne of God , and of the Lamb ,
66022002	In the middle of the broad street of the City . On each side of the river was a Tree of Life , Bearing twelve kinds of fruit , Each month yielding its own fruit . And the leaves of the tree Were for the healing of the nations .
66022003	And there will be no more curse But in it will be the throne of God and of the Lamb .
66022004	And his slaves will serve and worship him . They will see his face .
66022005	His name will need no lamplight nor sunlight , Because the Lord God will give them light ; And they will reign forever and ever .
66022006	Then he said to me . " These words may be trusted , and are true . the Lord , the God of the spirits of the prophets , has sent his angel to show his slaves what must soon take place .
66022007	" And behold , I am coming quickly . Blessed is he who keeps the words of the prophecy of this book . "
66022008	And I , John , am he who heard and saw these things . And after I heard and saw them , I fell down to worship at the feet of the angel who showed them to me .
66022009	But he said to me . " See thou do it not . I am only a fellow slave with you and your brothers , the prophets , and with those who keep the words of this Book . " WORSHIP GOD ! "
66022010	And he said to me , " Do not seal up the words of the prophecy of this book ; for the crisis is near .
66022011	He who is wicked , let him be wicked still ; He who is filthy , let him be filthy still ; He who is righteous , lit him practise righteousness still ; And he who is holy , let him be made holy still .
66022012	Behold , I come quickly ; and my reward is with me , To give to each man what his actions merit .
66022013	I am the Alpha and the Omega , The First and the Last , The Beginning and the End .
66022014	" Blessed are they who wash their robes , so that they may have right to the Tree of Life , and may enter in by the gates into the City .
66022015	Without are the dogs , the sorcerers , the immoral , the murderers , the idolaters , and all who live and make a lie .
66022016	" I , Jesus , have sent my angel to give you this testimony for the churches . I am the root and offspring of David , the bright and morning Star .
66022017	" And the Spirit and the Bride say Come ! And let him who hears , say Come ! And let him who thirsts , come ; And whoever wills , let him take the Water of Life freely . "
66022018	I testify to every man who hears the words of the prophecy of this book . If any man shall add to them , God will add to him the plagues which are written in this book ;
66022019	and if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy , God will take away his share in the Tree of Life , and in the Holy City , about which this book is written .
66022020	He who testifies this says , " Yea , I am coming quickly . " Amen ! Come , Lord Jesus !
66022021	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with the saints !
